recentChanges:
The NBA Season is back! NBA LIVE Mobile brings you all new fresh content to play along with.

-New gameplay improvements including enhanced rebounding, blocking and AI shooting tendencies.

-Play to showcase your talent with new campaigns and earn exclusive rewards with an all-new LIVE PASS

-Build up your team on the way to the NBA Playoffs

-Improved performance and stability
comments: Keep improving. This game needs a "heat check." If you make 3 shots with the same player, the player should catch fire and gain a boost or special ability. Or make 3 defensive plays and catch fire on defense. I think the this will give a boost. Better rewards for getting to the playoffs and winning the finals. When you win the finals and start a new season and you don't get a ring, what's the point? Give more incentives. Make a kobe bryant leaderboard to tracks how many rings you get!

This is a great game. I would reccomend this game for any NBA fan. The controls are very smooth and are easy. The graphics are great, but they don't look exactly right. I like that you can choose your own franchise. The packs that are in the store are pretty expensive, but what you get in them is worth it. There are old players, as well as some new ones. Some old ones are Allen Iverson and Ray Allen. Some active ones are LeBron James, Steph Curry, and James Harden.

For the love of God fix the damn game crashes... it just doesn't stop. I dont know what happened on the last update but damn guys. The game keeps crashing and logging me off. I cant watch the ads to earn beef because they either won't play or they get stuck and im left with a black screen then have to close the app and start it over to try again. I love this game, i play it constantly, but damn, yall have to fix this, it is beyond annoying and prevents me from building my teams.

Requested a refund because of an unauthorized purchase, and EA refused to send a refund. They always took a long time to respond to emails, and often just sent the same message back, which was very little help. They also kept telling me I had to ask Google for a refund, but then Google sent me back to EA. It was like the 2 of them were playing ping pong and I was the ball, just going back and forth. Would not reccomend playing this game or spending any money whatsoever.

While the graphics and gameplay is fun, to get anywhere real you need to pay a lot of money, as are all typical EA games. But there are some conection problems and I can only fathom about telling you how many half court shots the opposing AI has made in crucial buzzer beater situations. Imagine about an hour of grinding just wasted because of that. Multiple times. Other then that, I suppose it's okay.

title: BeautyCam
description:
A globally beloved photo & video app
Join 800 million users on BeautyCam to find your most beautiful self.
---BeautyCam is filled with exciting new updates---
„ÄêPrimary mode„Äë
A gift for taking amazing photos without excessive beautification. We realize it is important to keep your inherent beauty that you cherish.
„ÄêSlender„Äë
Change head to body ratio instantly! Three body adjusting plans and several pose templates are offered for you to snap mesmerizing full body photos.
„ÄêAmazing styles„Äë
Reach trending makeup looks and filters with ease! Take amazing selfies in one tap! All types of beauty are accessible!
„ÄêMovieCam„Äë
Snap high-quality photos and VIDEOS! Say goodbye to messy backgrounds with movie-like blurring effects. Now you can make a video under the MovieCam mode in 10 seconds.
„ÄêTrending Stickers„Äë
Tons of popular and creative AR stickers of different styles. Create funny, cute or cool selfies whenever you like.
„ÄêAI Portrait„Äë
Save fuzzy nighttime portrait shots. Easily snap SLR-quality HD pics even in dark environments!
„ÄêNatural Beautification Effects„Äë
Intelligently recongnizes and analyzes facial features to customize exclusive beauty style. Adjust any details that you feel like optimizing and provide natural effects from top to bottom.
„ÄêStunning Makeup Looks„Äë
Various popular makeup selfie effects that'll make your selfies mesmerizing even when you're makeup-less!
„ÄêGIF„Äë
A must-have function to colorize daily chats. Make gifs full of unique features and so is your social life.
„ÄêFine filters„Äë
Different filter styles preferred by Internet celebrities that can be used for shooting selfies, food, architecture, and scenery.

title: Baby Twins - Newborn Care
description:
Why are baby games so fun? Because who doesn‚Äôt love playing with and taking care of babies?! But out of all baby games, we think you‚Äôll especially love this one. You get to take care of the cutest, wildest baby twins ever! Sure, these babies are a handful and love to get into trouble, but they're also tons of fun! Dress up your twins in adorable clothes, feed them yummy snacks, care for them at the doctor & so much more!

Play silly baby games, enjoy coloring pages & solve puzzles with your favorite twins! There‚Äôs so much to do with your silly twins! Get ready for double the trouble, double the fun! Baby games have never been so adorable or silly!

Features:
> Dress up your babies in adorable matching outfits! 
> Design unique clothing & accessories for your baby wins! 
> Decorate your babies‚Äô bedroom! Build cribs, chose room decorations & more! 
> Feed & care for your baby twins yummy snack! Don‚Äôt make a mess!

> Doctor Care - check your twins‚Äô throats, give them medicine & help your babies feel better!

> Tuck your twins into bed - good night, silly twins!

title: Top Speed: Drag & Fast Racing
description:
Dominate your criminally insane rivals in extreme head-to-head drag races!

‚Ä¢ Pick from 69 cars: stock rides, dragsters, and police vehicles
‚Ä¢ Let your creativity flow through a ton of tuning and customization options
‚Ä¢ Drive in 5 city districts, each with its own unique theme and gang crew
‚Ä¢ A real-life inspired aircraft carrier to race on
‚Ä¢ Epic arcade game modes
‚Ä¢ Adrenaline inducing Most Wanted police chases
‚Ä¢ Mind-blowing 3D HD visuals

Reach impossible speeds by expertly timing gear changes and bursts of nitro
Top Speed is setting the new standard within drag racing genre. Have you ever wanted to participate in underground races against unpredictable mafia mobs? Drive top class luxury cars and show everybody who's the boss? Jump right behind the wheel and get ready to have your breath taken away the moment you push that nitro button.

Drive 69 cars, beat 20 criminal overlords and become the biggest fish in the city
In Top Speed you can tune and mod your ride to your liking. Increase the engine's power, upgrade your gear and nitro, repaint your car, slap on some decals if you need to. All of it will have a definite impact on the realistic driving simulation. When you unlock elite dragsters you can also reach for the most hardcore visual mods from the black market. All of the goods from the criminal nation are at your disposal - you just make sure to make good use of them in the race.

Choose any car you want from an astounding selection of 69 rides - you can drive classic stock cars, new heavily modded dragsters and even national police vehicles from 5 different countries.

Nothing will stop you from burning the rubber on the streets. All races take place off the grid, away from the traffic, so you can get crazy with burnout, plow the asphalt and race with no limits.

Challenge the odds as a mafia underdog and make your way to the very top.
On every step, you'll have to race against each of the 20 criminal overlords that keep the city in their steel grasp. The city's asphalt will become a battleground and no limit will be placed upon you - let ambition and adrenaline be your guide in this race. You're the best new racer on these streets, but your rivals still don't know that. How about showing them that by leaving them behind in the smoke from burnout after you drop the nitro? Kids, don't try this at home!

Drag race in 5 beautiful and distinctive city districts.
From quaint Suburbs to teeming with high life Downtown, your need for sightseeing will be satisfied. Drive for glory and adrenaline in the Little Asia district, a fusion of China and the western world. Reach incredible velocities on the scenic Highway. As a professional arcade racer, you'll have plenty of opportunities to show off your ride in nice and realistic surroundings.

Your skills will be tested, so get ready for the most intense arcade racing game of 2017! Download for FREE now.

Turn on, tune it, race out!

comments: 1.A good game but you can't go further because for upgrading very last tier car's u have to use a lot of money no problem in that but if we participate in other race I just got very low money as compared to money I spend to upgrade car's.üòëüòåüò¨ 2.It is like compulsory to buy in game money from INR or USD if u don't buy in game coins,gold's etc. You can't be able to move further and upgrade all the cars in the game it's like impossible üò§üò§

Game seems like it would be decent but it is unplayable. The game won't let me do a single race or ranking race. It worked fine for the first 30 mins or so after install but now won't let me play either of those two modes which are the primary modes I'm the game.

At first few minutes , I played and it's fine . Then , after 5 minutes , I can't play on street racing mode and ranking mode . What happen ? I mean , the loading really slow and i think this is a problem . You guys might wanna solve this small issue

Good game! WELL IT WAS UNTIL I DOWNLOADED THE UPDATE NOW ALL I GET IS RIPPED OFF!! RACED VERSUS MODE AND GOT THREE DEEP IN REWARDS AND JUMPED ME BACK TO THE BEGINNING!!!! AND WHAT'S WITH THE CARS IN VERSUS MODE MY CAR CAN BE 100 OR MORE STRONGER THAN MY APPONENTS AND I STILL LOSE!!!! DOESN'T SEEM WORTH THE EFFORT!!!!! ONLY THING TO DO IS UNINSTALL AND TRY SOMETHING ELSE SO SAD GUESS I SHOULDN'T HAVE DOWNLOADED THE UPDATE LESSON LEARNED!!!!!
All over best game , but only one problem that when i play event mode it say to turn on net , but when turn on my net then also event is not coming . So please correct event mode in the game.

title: Bubble Witch 2 Saga
description:
From the makers of Candy Crush Saga, Bubble Witch Saga & Farm Heroes Saga comes Bubble Witch 2 Saga!

Stella and her cats need your help to fend off the dark spirits that are plaguing their land. Travel the realm bursting as many bubbles as you can in this exciting bubble shooting puzzle adventure. Win levels and free Witch Country piece by piece. Play this epic saga alone or with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Bubble Witch 2 Saga is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

Bubble Witch 2 Saga features:
‚Ä¢ The next exciting instalment to the Bubble Witch franchise 
‚Ä¢ New and improved game modes
‚Ä¢ Enchanting graphics that will leave you spellbound
‚Ä¢ Hundreds of magical bubble shooting levels ‚Äì more added every 2 weeks!
‚Ä¢ Easily sync the game between devices when connected¬† to the Internet
‚Ä¢ Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
‚Ä¢ Collect stars to unlock special items to help you on your quest 
‚Ä¢ Special boosters & bubbles to help you pass those tricky levels
‚Ä¢ Free & easy to play, challenging to master!

Visit https://care.king.com/ or contact us in game by going to Settings > Customer Care if you need help!

Follow us to get news and updates;
facebook.com/BubbleWitchSaga2
Twitter @BubbleWitchSaga
https://www.youtube.com/user/BubbleWitchOfficial
http://bubblewitch2saga.com/

Have fun playing Bubble Witch 2 Saga!

Do not sell my data: King shares your personal information with advertising partners to personalize ads. Learn more at https://king.com/privacyPolicy.  If you wish to exercise your Do Not Sell My Data rights, you can do so by contacting us via the in game help centre or by going to https://soporto.king.com/

comments: I did an update last night causing me to lose lives I had stored up, gold bars and even though I beat level 734 over 6 times it will not let me move past. On the Bingo like game it will not give me credit when I clear a space. Unloaded and reloaded no help. Had this game for a long time and this is the first time i had this big problem.

I've been playing ALL the Bubble Witches for years now and I COMPLETELY fell in love with all of them! ü•∞ I have a panic disorder and these games help so much to soothe my anxieties and let me focus on the fun! I absolutely LOVE the sounds and watching all the super colorful bubbles fall into the cauldronsüíû EXCELLENT JOB, KING'S BUBBLE WITCHES! YOU ARE ABSOLUTELY MAGICAL üí´üîÆ

I love this game yet, level 136 can't be passed! The game doesn't give enouh bubbles and with no boosters, it's not passable! Three days trying to advance, is just irritating! I am fixing to uninstall if I don't pass it after today. Ridiculous!

I love bubble witch saga games. However I've wrote twice now about being screwed out of extra bubbles I've purchased and I'm unable to send or receive extra lives from anyone. None of my friends even show up to send lives to and I know a bunch of my friends who play. Fix these issues and give me back the gold I was cheated and ill change my rating.

I love this game but got to level 812 and can no longer pass this level I do not understand what happened either nor where to go to find out why I can not move forward in this game..worked hard to get this high so do not want to start over.but had a blast getting to this level

title: Sniper Arena: PvP Army Shooter
description:
Sniper! Enter the arena and become the #1 SHARPSHOOTER in this thrilling ‚Äòsniper vs. sniper‚Äô LIVE COMBAT game! Compete against more than 500K SNIPERS worldwide, climb the leaderboard, and ENJOY EVERY BATTLE in this premier mobile experience! Feel the pure adrenaline rush, and lifelike combat emotions in the heat of the battlefield, right in your hands on your mobile screen. Jump into the action and join the battle right away, it‚Äôs FREE TO PLAY!

‚Ä¢ Enjoy breathtaking 3D GRAPHICS: the world‚Äôs best SNIPER RIFLES, superbly realistic and authentic in every little detail, and 4 spectacular combat locations with authentic sniper firing positions, beautifully designed in terms of game logic and the balance.

‚Ä¢ Try intuitively easy controls - SWIPE, ZOOM, SHOOT! Compete in 3 game modes: Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, and Domination with up to 8 real opponents on the map, whoever shoots the most enemies wins the round.

‚Ä¢ Develop your SNIPER CAREER, from recruit all the way to the rank of Phantom, with a variety of daily tasks and a detailed ranking system. Unlock and upgrade modern PROFESSIONAL EQUIPMENT: sniper rifles, ammunition, camouflage and special equipment.

‚Ä¢ Ally with your friends and create an UNSTOPPABLE SQUAD! Lead them to the top of the leaderboard, defeat other teams and win territories in Domination mode.

This game requires stable INTERNET CONNECTION to play. The gameplay involves real-time online match ups with players across the globe, shared server for any mobile device, and LIVE-CHAT.

For more info and all the latest news check out: https://www.facebook.com/SniperArenaGame/

comments: This is a great game for players who are wanting to play against other teams and players who want to shoot guns +different modifications for sniper rifles. Very easy controls. Definitely one of my favorite games ive ever played. Thanks to the Development team on this game hope to see more games from these developers.

There is little time to get all enemy, no indication where enemy is, there is no stability of the gun while in hand, no one is that unstable, it's not real life action holding it. The game is based on snipers having the opportunity to kill one another, so why are they getting hit so many times bleeding out and recovering?

I'm just a casual gamer thats been playing the game more than a year, and right now am at level Elite Sniper (1@2, not too sure)... I've only noticed within a week or so that I'm being put together with high rank players (usually just 1 player) and rest would be bots... This occurs throughout all the battles i choose, be it deathmatch, raid etc... I just want to play casually, get my daily rewards, collect my points, cash n diamonds via deathmatch n such. ..

Youre clearly outmatched half of the time as you get killed just as the screen opens. You dont even get a look at the battlefield & youre dead. The only in game purchase worth the price is MAYBE cash. Everything else is ridiculously overpriced for what you get. But when the battles are fair, its pretty fun game

At the beginning it was okay because I believed that there are other individuals who are online playing but I've found that the chatrooms are fake , every single person is playing with robots, and the scores for each game is completely made up and they are not real. If you don't buy anything from them for your game to upgrade you can't continue playing. .

comments: I have used both paid and free photo editing apps, and I have to admit this photo editing app is absolitely Awesome in comparison to all the free and paid P.E.A. combined!! besides the excessive ads and the impending fear of not being able to use the app at all (for the purpose I downloaded it for) thanks to the forceful hand of a monthly-paid membership,, this app works great. it's literally the only thing I've found where I'm able to edit moodboards the way I've been wanting to, so I thank it for that

This app is absolutely amazing. I have been using it for like 2 years now. If you understand all the features (which are so many), you won't ever need any other photo editing app. It has no logos after making a collage or editing, great layouts , different sizes with ratios and options while making collage to crop , swap , delete , anything. You can choose the border or just have no borders. it's just awesome. Thanks for the app makers.

Like flying for the first time. Like a pool on a hot summer day in Modesto. Like a cup of hot chocolate on Christmas. Like checking ALL the boxes on your daily to do list. Like having all the laundry folded after watching an episode of the magicians, except that towel you used to wipe your tears with. Like strawberry bingsu in loser angeles in August. Like hugging your mom. Like reaching Challenger in Starcraft. Like making before after pictures of when you finally clean. Like comment subscribe.

Very nice app ...I accidentally uninstall this up and I almost cry ..good thing after searching for days I found it..this is very useful in making invitations..I just wish you add more text options, calligraphy,and color like gliter effect on text .good thing this is update new effects were add..kudos to the developer..keep up the good work.

title: Final Fantasy XV: A New Empire
description:
Alexis Ren is waiting for you! Join the adventure! Be the hero of your own Final Fantasy XV adventure in the brand new mobile strategy game Final Fantasy XV: A New Empire! Build your own kingdom, discover powerful magic, and dominate the realm alongside all of your friends! 

Final Fantasy XV: A New Empire is a mobile adventure that lets you rewrite a favorite classic to fulfill your unique destiny. Journey through vast kingdoms, gather magical resources, and build the strongest Empire in Final Fantasy history! Fight fire with magic to defend friends and defeat foes alongside millions of players from around the world! Do you have the strength and strategy to control the Crystal and rule the Realm?

‚úî Experience your very own epic FFXV adventure on your mobile phone
‚úî Jump into the action with Noctis, Cindy, and all of your favorite FF15 characters
‚úî Fight alongside friends and against foes in legendary battles against millions of players from around the world!
‚úî Build up your large army and best strategy to win in real-time action-packed battles
‚úî Create the ultimate Guild or join up with already-powerful forces
‚úî Strategize with your guild to crush enemies and beasts in real-time battles
‚úî Compete for the Crystal against players from all over the world
‚úî Travel the Realms and collect rare resources to build an epic Empire
‚úî Become a legend by taking control of the Crystal and ruling the Realm

An epic world with no rules: only magic. Will your magic grow to stand the test of time or will your empire be defeated?

Embark on your own Final Fantasy XV mobile adventure alongside Alexis Ren. Your legend starts now in the new MMORPG: Final Fantasy 15: A New Empire.

Privacy Policy: https://www.finalfantasyxvapp.com/privacy-policy?lang=en
Terms of Service: https://www.finalfantasyxvapp.com/terms-of-use
Game Page: https://www.finalfantasyxvapp.com/

comments: Great game but guild chat is lacking and not linear. It should be obvious and on top of that, the game does not support landscape view, which is a bummer. I am going to have to uninstall because I am using Android on laptop without touch and playing on a phone is hard on the eyes. If you fixed these things, I would give 5 stars and continue to play.

New developers are listening at least. Now this is so far a temporary 5 stars, they have to continue to make the game playable. It's in a fairly good state for active players currently. If you find yourself with Google play cards laying around and nothing seems to interest you, this game is very social and has several communities to join. Will things burn, probably, but that's slowly becoming less of an account destroying experience. If the new developers screw it up, I'll re-review again.

The game is all about pay to play. If you try to play it for free, you'll get so far behind that it is ridiculous. The cost to level up of resources and scrolls is unbelievably expensive. The events don't even tailor to your level (that's how they get you to pay to stay caught up). This game is absolutely horrible. Oh, if you try to contact customer service, you'll get a copy and paste response. They don't care about their players. FYI, the packs go up to the $100's.

It's rated PEGI 7 , but requires purchases that cost more than the average persons weekly shopping. Getting kids to spend ¬£95 on a pack is criminal, (they claim it's free to play) that's also false advertising. You can spend ¬£95 on one hero, then a few days later a new hero will be available which is much better than the one you just bought, that makes your purchase useless. The releases are fast which encourages you to spend more, not much good to say . üëç

I've spent my fair share of money on this game. Developers have no control or care. They allow lvl 50-60 wipe out lower lvl players and allows them to do whatever. If they intended this game to be fun for all they have fail miserably. I've sent tickets in for them to limit 50-60 level players to attack no lower than level 35 so the rest of us can compete. This is a pay to play kind of game, if you don't pay dont play because there's no use.

title: Rocky Climb
description:
Accept the challenge and conquer the truest of nature's wonders!

Simple and addictive game! Just hop in and climb the highest mountains and the steepest peaks! 

-GAME FEATURES-

-Endless fun with procedurally generated levels
-Plenty of customization options to make the character your own
-Clean art style for a simple and enjoyable experience 
-Intuitive controls focus to be fun and engage you
-Leaderboards to compete with strangers across the globe
-Smart Sharing will capture your triumphant highscore moment

Feedback is not only welcome but appreciated!

summary: Try to reach the top!
developerAddress: 220088, Republic of Belarus, Minsk, Antonovskaya 14b, office 300
recentChanges: Enjoy the game!
comments: Pretty simple and relaxing gameplay. It's a nice game that doesn't consume a lot of my phones battery and I can play whenever, wherever.

Ridiculous right from the beginning! There is no learning curve whatsoever. If you're not absolutely perfect when you tap to climb, you start from scratch. If you like attempting the same thing over and over and over again then this is the game for you!

Awesome! üéâüéäNever imagined mountain climbing could be fun üòé Had to learn the move then it's smooth climbing, ofcourse at some point difficulty arise yet interesting üëåüëåüëå The fellow is not Tom Cruise üòÄ more like Rambo! Infinite life, short check points so never frustrating, Great game üëç Could have added music. Simple, clear, pleasing graphics üèÜ

this game not only requires skill but also thinking. it's a game of awareness and you have to be accurate to win. I personally quite enjoy this game although there can be different perspectives from others. honestly I enjoy this game and I recommend others to play it as well. But there can be small impovements it does not have to be not major ones. I love this game!

I have an idea. It might counter the games name but its ok. Have a skyscraper thats being built. There will be metal bars or cement blocks instead of rocks. Also have a crane thats carrying either of the two I that just said. The crane will move it side to side. You must turn the broken rocks into the things that I said but with an engineer on top of it. As you climb on it, the engineer will step on your hand. As you reach the top, the owner will kick you out making you go to the next skysc/mt.

title: Ace Fishing: Wild Catch
description:
Journey to the world's most beautiful destinations and fish for real in paradise!

Jump into paradise blue and experience the ultimate 3D fishing adventure!
Know nothing about fishing? It's okay! You'll be able to catch the Blue Pointer with just a tap!
Download Ace Fishing now to travel all over the world and fish at the most famous fishing spots!

1. Fishing Made Easy
- Get hooked on fishing with simple, one-touch controls! 
- Who says fishing is boring? Just 3 seconds is all it takes before heart-pounding action!
- Complete the tutorial and practice in the Practice Room to master the skills and even get rewards!

2. Jaw-dropping 3D Graphics
- Interact with catches so life-like they could fly off your screen!
- Perfectly recreated physics of fishing means you'll be able to feel the excitement of fishing at your fingertips!

3. It doesn't get any more real than this!
- Fishing rods customizable with fishing lines of varying length and tension strength!
- Hang in there- tire out the fish through epic struggles!
- Fish movements and characteristics captured with stunning realism!
- Complicated mechanisms made easy to bring the most realistic fishing experience to mobile gaming! 

4. Travel the World
- From Hanauma Bay to the Amazon River, and China! No place is off-limits!
- Hundreds of exotic fish native to different areas! Venture through the entire map to catch them all! 

5. Global Rankings
- Reel in the biggest fish and break records! Compete in fishing tournaments held by the hour and go head-to-head against users from around the globe! 
- Prepare the lure for the target fish through Lure Crafting System to rank higher!
- Your records are automatically saved every time you fish, so you can aim to break them! 

6. More to Enjoy!
- Equip Accessories on your rod for more power! Use the Pearl Powders to Power-up your Accessories!
- Utilize the special Fever Mode! Fever Mode will increase your stats to the MAX so you can catch the fish you've always dreamed of!

7. Shh! It's a Secret!
- A special League Ranking to show  off your skills is coming soon!

recentChanges:
Jump into paradise blue seas and experience the ultimate 3D fishing adventure!

- Atlantis Area has been updated.
- Ad exposure rate has been improved.
- Paid items are now stored in a separate Inbox.
- Accessory property level can now be increased at once.
- Bermuda Wild Fish points have been increased slightly.
- 1vs1 can only be used in the latest version.
- Fixed other minor issues.

Got feedback? Leave a review or visit http://customer-m.withhive.com/ask and drop us a line!
comments: The game is a good game, dont get me wrong. But there are 3 big things that are issues for me. One, is that the game is very complicated. There is so much stuff when you open the menu, I feel it would be better even if it was a little more "basic". Also, there are lots of ads, which I mean the game has to make money. Lastly, it needs a strong internet connection to play, and I feel an offline mode would be nice.

I have been playing this game for over 3 years and I was just starting to get somewhere with a purchased rod and reel. The posiden rod 5 stars stats were rather good then with a successful evolution to a 6 star rod it gives me garbage stats I would expect from a 3 star rod and no way to go back to my previous rod. The stats on evolution should be a comparison or better of the 2 rods your using to improve the one you already have. Not the garbage it gave me. You could answer your emails.

Really cool option to play as if your phone is an actual fishing pole W/ phones gyro. You progress quickly & are given enough free loot to start and keep the game going as you progress to earn higher level equipment and achievements. Graphics are great, controls are very easy and straight forward. Also very accurate in the depiction of the different types of fish that you would actually catch. Game accurately depicts the fish that are indigenous to the areas you fish in the game. Overall GREAT!!

If you cant play for a while you will lose your guild and all the money and hard work you put in will be give to someone on your team and they wont talk and don't fish much this suck by far thus the 1 star rating a bot in control of my guild you email for help and they tell you its nothing they can do you have to w8 till person misses 20 days or more im pissed as all hell because I worked at the hospital when rona popped up and had to work doubles i had no time to check in. I want all my $ back
It should have higher quality graphics setting. Good game, but the graphics is still stuck in 2014. It doesn't look good on a FHD screen.

title: Bloons TD Battles
description:
Play the top-rated tower defense franchise in this all new head-to-head strategy game!

Go monkey vs monkey with other players in a bloon-popping battle for victory! From the creators of best-selling Bloons TD 5, this all new Battles game is specially designed for multiplayer combat, featuring 18 custom head-to-head tracks, incredible towers and upgrades, all-new attack and defense boosts, and the ability to control bloons directly and send them charging past your opponent's defenses. 

Check out these awesome features! 
* Head-to-head two player Bloons TD 
* 27 custom Battles tracks 
* 22 awesome monkey towers, each with 8 powerful upgrades 
* Assault Mode - manage strong defenses and send bloons directly against your opponent 
* Defensive Mode - build up your income and outlast your challenger with your superior defenses
* Battle Arena Mode - Put your medallions on the line in a high stakes Assault game. Winner takes all.
* Card Battles Mode - Choose the perfect deck of tower and bloon cards to outwit and outplay your opponent
* Monkey Tower Boost - supercharge your monkey towers to fast attack for a limited time 
* Bloons Boost - power up your bloons to charge your opponent in Assault mode 
* Create and join private matches to challenge any of your facebook friends 
* 16 cool achievements to claim 
* Customize your bloons with decals so your victory has a signature stamp 

If you are new to Bloons tower defense games, don't worry - a helpful tutorial walks you through the game, and matchmaking will help balance the opponents you face. And if you want to battle against your friends, you can easily create and join private matches with anyone on your Facebook friends list. 

The choice of strategy is yours - hunker down for the long game, or go for the quick win with a rush of fast Bloons? Jump into a game of Bloons TD Battles now! 

REQUIRES INTERNET CONNECTION

PERMISSIONS: Bloons TD Battles requests permission to access to read and write to your external storage to buffer video ads. Video ads help fund the production of our free games, so we appreciate your understanding and support. If there are ever any problems with the amount of data stored, please contact us at support@ninjakiwi.com.

YouTubers and Streamers: Ninja Kiwi is actively developing, supporting, and promoting channel creators on YouTube, Twitch, Kamcord, and Mobcrush. If you are not already working with us, keep making videos and then tell us about your channel at youtube@ninjakiwi.com.

developerAddress:
PO Box 26
Kumeu
0841
New Zealand
recentChanges: Do you have what it takes to challenge the most dastardly Battles player of all time: Professor Evil? Take on this weekly Battle Challenge using preset towers and claim your prize. Let the battle commence!
comments: Hey its ya boi Gary I have been playing for almost 2 and a half years and this game is just fine.. the only "bug" is losing connection.. if you read it it can tell you if you are haveing connection issues or it is your opponent.. The new powers are. well new. they tweak them and sometimes completely change how they work so if you dont like them tell them why.. dont cry about it And lastly, i was extremely bored and looked at the 1 star reviews.. think before you post

My favorite game on Google play. I play this game constantly while I have wifi. I bought the club arena pass (at half price) a while back and I thoroughly enjoy playing in the double income arenas. I only buy games MAYBE once a year on Google Play. If you're a fan of BTD and you're wondering if it's worth it, I think it is. You can either get it for it's regular price or check back when it's half price.

Love this game. At the beginning it can be tough until you unlock all of the towers but once you get the hang of it it is a really fun and competitive game. My brother and I play against each other to see how far we can get without dying (our record is level 54) I would absolutely recommend this and have recommended this to friends. Best free game and it is not pay to win which is a bonus

it's an amazing game, I am a competitive person and this makes the game even more enjoyable... at the start it is difficult but once you get all the towers and get a lot of the upgrade tiers the game is so much fun. I also like the game because of all the strategy involved. and that's why I rated this 5 stars but it deserves 10 stars!

Its a great game! But i also think they should add a mode where you have a set amount of money, say, 200k and then have like speed bonanza and old school and stuff luke that for different modes in thus mode... And then try and defend to a certian round, And then there are special buffs, say all towers's cooldowns are reduced to .0001 or something idk just random and then the buffs could last the whole game... I just think that this would be a lit addition to the game. cya! üòé

title: School of Dragons
description:
Fly fast, train hard, and learn well to become the Ultimate Dragon Trainer! Join Chief Hiccup and Toothless and embark on the thrilling adventures of DreamWorks Animation‚Äôs ‚ÄòHow to Train Your Dragon‚Äô.   
Play with your friends and explore mysterious worlds in this action-packed learning experience! Rescue, hatch, and train Dreamworks Dragons, defend New Berk and the Hidden World, and battle Grimmel and Stormheart in the ultimate dragon adventure! 

***Reached No. 1 of ALL ROLE-PLAYING GAMES in 80 countries ***

Features:
‚Ä¢ Train, fly, and customize over 60 of your favorite Dreamworks Dragons from the movies including Toothless, Light Fury, Stormfly and Deathgrippers.
‚Ä¢ Customize your dragons with thousands of colors and skins, so no 2 dragons look alike!
‚Ä¢ Fly dragons and race against your friends in over 30 courses!
‚Ä¢ Hatch and collect dragons in your stables and send them out on dragon missions to bring back treasure and loot!
‚Ä¢ Venture across 30 islands and lands and embark on epic quests and more! 
‚Ä¢ Meet new characters and adventure in new story lines in our 8 expansion packs and over 400 quests!
‚Ä¢ Play Dragon Tactics, our dragon-squad strategy game, and defeat enemies for loot and prizes

Subscription Options:
*This app offers 4 membership subscription options: $9.99 /month, $24.99 /3 months, $47.99 /6 months, and $84.99 /year. 
** Membership Subscription will auto-renew, and the account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be managed and turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.

For more information, view our current privacy policy (http://www.schoolofdragons.com/Help/privacypolicy) and terms of use (http://www.schoolofdragons.com/help/siteterms).
Registration information is optional (children under 13 require parent registration). You will be able to be notified of game updates and new features along with integration to our online educational world for kids.
PLEASE NOTE: School of Dragons is completely free to play, but offers game content, customization options, and items for purchase with real money.  If you choose not to use this feature, you can disable in-app purchases through your device‚Äôs settings.

Suite 208
El Segundo, CA  90245
recentChanges:
Dreadfall has arrived at campus, covering the school grounds with pumpkins, spiderwebs, and everything spooky! Vikings can begin collecting candies and earning time-limited rewards by participating in the many Dreadfall activities. Those participating can look forward to:
‚Ä¢ Bonestormer ‚Äì new hybrid dragon
‚Ä¢ Bonestormer Dreadfall skin
‚Ä¢ New Dreadfall themed racetracks
‚Ä¢ 8 new Dreadfall themed Dragon Tactics levels
‚Ä¢ 2 new Dreadfall missions
‚Ä¢ 20 daily quests
‚Ä¢ New Dreadfall maze
comments: Honestly, I've played this game before, so I got it again, only to be disappointed. Whenever I create (or try to) my viking, it stops at the name and says there is a problem registering my viking. Other people are having this issue, but I will keep the game and see if it's resolved soon. Jumpstart Games, fix your game, please.

It's overall a good game that I can spend my time on, but there are a lot of issues that makes many people frustrated. The infamous Battle Event glitch keeps appearing and it sucks. Also, stop changing the Battle Event rewards for the events. I just want to farm gems without engaging in the event, but it forces me to get candy instead. Events should be, well, an event that gives players an option to engage in it or not. Thawfest was the reason why I kept the game uninstalled for months.

It has been awesome playing this game and I love it !!!!!!! I'm glad that you fixed the wild dragon disappearing thing !! But .....I can't do like ....anything ! Cuz you have to pay money for gems and you can't do anything if you don't have gems ! I'd love it if you made there be less coin spending on the new quests and stuff like that !! Please do !!

This game is great.... except that the chat system is awful (the chat is a tad bit too censored and you could get banned for a simple mistake, even though they don't even tell what you said wrong, they just tell you that you said something wrong), the graphics aren't the best, but not the worst, and the controls (especially for decorating the farm) are kinda terrible. But, I suppose it is somewhat decent if you look past the issues. Also, the teen dragons are very glitchy and broken.

It's a fun game overall, but it's also a Pay-to-Win game. You either have to spend money on memberships or gems to do any of the fun quest, or grind for months. I have a membership account and it gets boring because theres no quests until a big update. You should add daily quest to level up your dragons, or just to do something fun. And I also get constantly get "Logged Out" of the game. Please fix that. And the chat is horrible. I can't say Hi or I get muted. But overall, it's a decent game.

title: Doctor Kids
description:
With the help of this game you can see what is like to be a doctor and treat kids in a children's hospital. You can make them healthy again and put a smile back on their faces. 
 
Children are coming to the clinic and they need your help to get better. Once you appoint the little patients to the right doctor‚Äôs office, you can have fun playing interactive minigames and treat kids in no time. 

Game presents different kinds of doctors and treatments, with many colorful objects to match patients‚Äô characteristics. Every doctor‚Äôs office includes a unique minigame to make treatment even more fun. And don‚Äôt forget about the ambulance car that is always in a hurry.

Within this game, you can do the following:
Appoint your patients to the dentist to brush and fix their broken teeth. 
Diagnose patients to heal them from strange diseases.
Make an eye examination test to improve kids‚Äô eyesight.
Use a microscope to make some lab tests and eliminate viruses. 
Use the X-ray machine to scan bones.
Drive an ambulance car and give first aid to patients.
Treat an ear infection and take a hearing test in the Xylophone minigame.

Features:
‚Ä¢ beautiful high quality HD graphics
‚Ä¢ intuitive, easy to use user interface
‚Ä¢ infinite gameplay with numerous combinations
‚Ä¢ many different patients in various clothes
‚Ä¢ offers 7 unique doctor‚Äôs offices: dental care, eye check, skin rashes cure, lab test and X-ray, ear doctor, ambulance car with emergency room (ER doctor)
‚Ä¢ includes 7 thematic minigames
‚Ä¢ tons of colorful plasters, bandages, braces, glasses and syrup flavours

This game is free to play but certain in-game items and features, also some of those mentioned in game description, may require payment via in-app purchases which cost real money. Please check your device settings for more detailed options regarding in-app purchases.
The game contains advertising for Bubadu‚Äôs products or some third parties which will redirect users to our or third-party site or app.

Privacy policy: https://bubadu.com/privacy-policy.shtml
Terms of service: https://bubadu.com/tos.shtml
descriptionHTML:
With the help of this game you can see what is like to be a doctor and treat kids in a children's hospital. You can make them healthy again and put a smile back on their faces.

Children are coming to the clinic and they need your help to get better. Once you appoint the little patients to the right doctor‚Äôs office, you can have fun playing interactive minigames and treat kids in no time.

Game presents different kinds of doctors and treatments, with many colorful objects to match patients‚Äô characteristics. Every doctor‚Äôs office includes a unique minigame to make treatment even more fun. And don‚Äôt forget about the ambulance car that is always in a hurry.

Within this game, you can do the following:
Appoint your patients to the dentist to brush and fix their broken teeth.
Diagnose patients to heal them from strange diseases.
Make an eye examination test to improve kids‚Äô eyesight.
Use a microscope to make some lab tests and eliminate viruses.
Use the X-ray machine to scan bones.
Drive an ambulance car and give first aid to patients.
Treat an ear infection and take a hearing test in the Xylophone minigame.

Features:
‚Ä¢ beautiful high quality HD graphics
‚Ä¢ intuitive, easy to use user interface
‚Ä¢ infinite gameplay with numerous combinations
‚Ä¢ many different patients in various clothes
‚Ä¢ offers 7 unique doctor‚Äôs offices: dental care, eye check, skin rashes cure, lab test and X-ray, ear doctor, ambulance car with emergency room (ER doctor)
‚Ä¢ includes 7 thematic minigames
‚Ä¢ tons of colorful plasters, bandages, braces, glasses and syrup flavours

This game is free to play but certain in-game items and features, also some of those mentioned in game description, may require payment via in-app purchases which cost real money. Please check your device settings for more detailed options regarding in-app purchases.
The game contains advertising for Bubadu‚Äôs products or some third parties which will redirect users to our or third-party site or app.

Privacy policy: https://bubadu.com/privacy-policy.shtml
Terms of service: https://bubadu.com/tos.shtml

title: Forge of Empires: Build your city
description:
Forge of Empires - Build a city!

Build an empire & travel through the ages! From ancient civilizations, through medieval kingdoms, and all the way to the future. Rise and rule your lands with pride!

Forge of Empires was originally released in 2012, becoming an award-winning strategy city-building browser game. This RTS MMO sim is live for 9 years now and is full of amazing content with a huge active player base from all over the world!

Features:

- Build your city, rule your empire and experience history! All while travelling through the eras of mankind.

 - Evolve your village into a town and then forge it into a megapolis!

- Be smart and efficient in building houses & producing resources. Make the best of your land!

- Find your own building style! Choose from hundreds of different houses and castles!

- Like to compete? Win tactical pvp battles in the multiplayer mode and conquer their realms!

- Not in a mood to fight? Exchange your goods and trade with your neighbors!

- Discover new territories & develop new technologies!

- Enjoy real life events (Christmas, Easter, Halloween and many more) and win amazing rewards and prizes!

Forge of Empires is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-¬≠app purchases in your device's settings. A network connection is also required.

General Terms and Conditions: https://legal.innogames.com/portal/en/agb
Imprint:	https://legal.innogames.com/portal/us/imprint

comments: You'll hear this a lot. Game is a marathon, not a sprint. If you are ready to spend time to build your own little city you can do it without any diamonds, premium currency. Community is really helpful and good guild can make all the difference for one to stick with the game. It can be played on both mobile and browser, which is great because as city grows more time is needed to get it to run optimally.

Unbalanced game play, players with much a bought stronger army can attack and plunder your items, super slow game play unless you're a pay player, I've been stuck for sometimes a week or more trying gain or trade for items to advance research, like I stated before if you throw real money at the game you can buy your way to the top a thousand times faster.

Great game! If you're looking to "beat" a game, this isn't it. It's a slow roll, even slower if you don't purchase diamonds. The game play is good, and even at a slow pace, I'm entertained. I do have a suggestion though.. I'd like to be able to sell my buildings to other users, especially in my guild. If I could get forge points, goods, etc instead of auction $, the game would be even more interesting.

Great game. However, a couple of suggestions 1. Please add a currently online/offline feature for players to see. Doesnt have to be seen by everyone, maybe just by friends and guild mates. 2. Please add in a last online feature for friends and guild mates to see. It is very hard to manage friends and guild list when you have no idea who are active and inactive players. 3. I find this game compared to most hardly gives out the in game currency(diamonds). Maybe try handing slightly more to players

The game is so bugged I can't even start playing it right, but also I have it's a pay to play game . I've put my 10$ in this game to see if it's worth it, but honestly didn't even reach the point where I use them cause game won't load event or story and so on.... In short- no.

title: The Survival Hunter Games 2
description:
The game comes fully loaded with amazing features! Our new game interface is extremely user friendly, and boasts easy to play touch screen controls that allow you to effortlessly run, jump, sprint, reload, aim, shoot and more! 

The new menu screen includes map style level select and settings screen. Gain game insight in between maps during loading with tip screens, and begin each game with mission style instructions! Before you begin your first level, you can watch a short video ad in order to earn a power up. You may opt not to watch, but you'll lose out on the advantage. 

As soon as the game begins, a timer will begin to count down. If you are able to beat the level quickly enough, you will earn a permanent weapon, which can be used in all other levels! If you do not beat the clock, you can still advance through the game, just without the permanent weapon. 

Fight stronger, more intelligent enemies, who make this game an intense battle of wit, stealth and skill! Enjoy hand-to-hand combat and precision aiming to take down enemies. Collect your blocky weapons and get ready to aim and shoot!!

Features:
-User friendly interface with touch pad controls
-Timers
-Power-ups
-Ammo and weapon collection
-Jump, aim and run
-Mini-map to spot your dangerous foes
-Mission orders
-Hand-to-hand combat

title: Dream League Soccer 2020
description:
Dream League Soccer 2020 puts you in the heart of the action with a fresh look and brand new features! Build your dream team from over 4,000 FIFPro‚Ñ¢ licensed players and take to the field against the world‚Äôs best soccer clubs! Rise through 8 divisions whilst enjoying full 3D motion-captured player moves, immersive in-game commentary, team customisations and much more. The beautiful game has never been so good!

BUILD YOUR DREAM TEAM
Sign top superstar players such as Luis Suarez & Gareth Bale to create your very own Dream Team! Perfect your style, develop your players and take on any team who stands in your way as you rise through the ranks. Upgrade your stadium with world-class facilities as you make your way to the Legendary Division. Have you got what it takes?

NEW AND IMPROVED GAMEPLAY 
The very best Dream League Soccer experience awaits with new animations and improved AI we‚Äôve revolutionised the most engaging football experience on mobile. Dream League Soccer 2020 is the perfect soccer package, one which captures the true spirit of the beautiful game.

DRESSED FOR SUCCESS
Feast your eyes on the best-looking Dream League Soccer experience ever! Customise your manager from a host of different options including hairstyles and outfits. Along with our new and improved graphics engine, your dream team has never looked this good!

CONQUER THE WORLD
Dream League Live puts your club against the very best in the world. Work your way through the ranks to prove your team is the greatest and compete in Global Leaderboards and Events for exclusive prizes!

FEATURES
‚Ä¢	Build and develop your dream team from over 3,500 FIFPro‚Ñ¢ licensed players
‚Ä¢	Full 3D motion-captured kicks, tackles, celebrations and goalkeeper saves gives unmatched realism
‚Ä¢	Reach legendary status as you rise through 8 divisions and compete in more than 10 cup competitions
‚Ä¢	Build your soccer empire from your own Stadium to Medical, Commercial and Training facilities
‚Ä¢	Recruit Agents and Scouts to help identify top talent in the transfer market
‚Ä¢	Immersive and exciting match commentary keeps you in the heart of the action
‚Ä¢	Use Coaches to develop your players technical and physical abilities
‚Ä¢	Customise your team‚Äôs kit and logo or import your own creations 
‚Ä¢	Take part in regular seasons and events to win unrivalled rewards
‚Ä¢	Compete against players from across the globe with Dream League Live
‚Ä¢	Our biggest soundtrack EVER! Featuring The Luka State, Sunset Sons, BETSIE G√òLD, Vistas and more!

* Please note: This game is free to play, but additional content and in-game items may be purchased for real money. 
* This game requires an internet connection and contains third party advertising.

comments: I have to say the graphics are really good, but sometimes, the ref gives a foul or yellow card when it is clearly not a foul. But the quality is good and in multiplayer, although it lags, it has exciting gameplay. I was and I am still critical because you have removed DLS 19, but this sort of wins it back. Pl focus on the improvements and add DLS 19 ( if possible)

Easily could've gotten 5 star with the gameplay itself. But ads every half time is terrible. I do watch ads to get extra coins so no need to put it at the half time. Also the cost for stadium is too expensive. You really expect the player to score 10 goals every game? Can't improve the squad and have to watch ads after every game just for the stadium upgrade bullcrap. That's just plain stupid.

So many things to improve. 1. The analog joystick. When my players make a long shot, the ball still move towards the goalkeeper even when I move the joystick to the top corner of the goal. 2. The goalkeeper's reaction doesn't make sense. Even the GK from PES still can be defeated at short range, unlike the GK in DLS 20. 3. The goalkeeper still error. You can review that game again. I don't know how to explain it ~_~

Out of all of the football games I have played, the controls and smooth gameplay that DLS offers is far better than the competition. PES and Fifa struggle to create such a unique and lag free experience, but every year DLS improves their already superior controls. DLS is in no way a pay to win game like Fifa and is a very enjoyable game. Everything about it is a 10/10 from me.

I love this game and wanted to give 5* but damn! Some things really piss me off. 1. Why don't we have control over how we upgrade our players anymore? 2. Why don't we have the options to sell our players for money ü§¶ Now the multiplayer experience is getting worse. It will disconnect even if there's strong network connection. And the other person wins. And your team's fitness drops.... Too bad

title: Light-It Up
description:
Warning: this game WILL hook you - jumping games have never been so awesomely addictive. 
It‚Äôs a dark world out there for a teeny little stickman like you, and it‚Äôs about time you light-it up and make the colors glow. 

Swing, jump, flip and slide your stickman body from one neon color shape to another to make them glow and light-it up. 

Collect stars as you swing, jump and flip to raise your score, in the funnest of all jumping games. 

Just when you start to feel like a stickman boss and are loving that color glow, things get complicated (or ‚Äústicky,‚Äù if you will) as you jump, flip and pass levels. Color shapes start moving, rotating and even exploding, and lethal spikes become a constant threat to your poor little stickman life.

If you miss a jump, if your swing‚Äôs a dud, if your flip isn‚Äôt on point, or if you hit a spike‚Ä¶ you fall into oblivion!

So what do you say, stickman? Ready to swing, jump, flip, light-it up and glow, in the brightest of all jumping games?

To opt out of CrazyLabs sales of personal information as a California resident, please visit our Privacy Policy: https://crazylabs.com/app

comments: It's decent. Good balance between being too difficult amd not difficult enough. The major problem is that once you hit lvl 50 the ads get to the point where you could probably sue for harassment. Lol, jk. Before lvl 50 there are ads bout every 3 or 4 tries. Reasonable. But after 50 its an ad after every single attempt which has led me to delete it.

Really cool concept, easy to learn, and relaxing even on difficult levels, however, I'm not giving 5 stars for 2 reasons, and I really hope the developers listen to me on this. TOO many ads, I have to turn off my internet because I can't even skip the "Retry?" screen, and there is an ad literally after every death. I understand that there's a profit to be made, and there's VIP, but tone it down a little, it crashes the experience. The other one is a suggestion: An endless mode, think about it

Very fun and addictive. Very pleasing visuals. The ads on the free are not too frequent. A fair and good balance of them. There is no one off as free option and the weekly fee is a little excessive. Would be 5 star if there was an option to remove ads for a one off fee and they can keep the weekly for the other parts of they want.

is literally this is literally the fun ever and plus when you pick new skins are the superheroes and when I play I pretend to be a superhero because I get to jump and go on top of the ships that light up and it is so fun this is like the funnest game I've ever done thank you so much for making this game one point about the ads it's really great at but sometimes every time I'm done with around it is starts an atom you're actually like 20 or five a bunch of seconds and I'm kind of annoyed.

The gameplay is simple but enjoyable but the adds are unbearable. Full screen video adds between each short level with sound that interrupts Bluetooth streamed audio. The juice just isn't worth the squeeze.

title: City Coach Bus Simulator 2020 - PvP Free Bus Games
description:

title: myAT&T
description:
Now, staying on top of your AT&T accounts is much easier with the myAT&T app. 
‚Ä¢ Check data usage: Want to keep tabs on your wireless or Internet data usage? Open the app to check usage on the overview screen.
‚Ä¢ Pay your bill: Never miss another payment. View/pay your bill in the app. Tell us how and when, and we'll let you know when your bill is ready.
‚Ä¢ Upgrade your phone or plan: Pick it up in the store, or have it delivered to you. You can also make changes to your plan right from the app.

comments: Very confusing. Every time I try to login I have to change my password. Takes me forever to accomplish anything with ATT. I uninstalled this app, could not get it to let me in. Wanted a wireless number that I do not have. All I want to do is pay my bills. I go through some kind of B.S. every month. Between being on the phone and using the simple AT&T app I have been at this for well over an hour, and still have not paid my bill. Ridiculous!

Update: Originally I could never pay my bill with the app. I always had to call in and explain the difficulties each time. The last 2 or 3 payments have been made so smoothly I would have to say this is now one of the better apps I use. Thanks for fixing all of the issues I have noticed. Original post: This app is absolutely junk. I have so much difficulty with paying my bill each and every month. It just sits there spinning gaining no traction.

I don't really know how good this works. It seems to be working a little bit better now, but it is still having problems remembering my USER ID AND PASSWORD. OH Well, I really hope that is just temporary. On one page it thinks it's 1 thing and on another page it thinks they are something else. For the third time, THIS APP OFFICIALLY STILL WON'T LET ME SIGN IN!üò†üò†üò°üò§ OTHER than that I guess it's ok.

Its been 2 months that me and my wife switched from Verizon to ATT, and yet have been able to get login into an online account. We have spent many hours trying to get this resolved with att and nobody seems to know how to fix the issue, still to this day nothing has been done. The customer service is very unprofessional, and possibly undertrained. I've never had such issues with Verizon and Verizon service is always top notch. Will be back with Verizon after our two years are up.

This app is garbage. You would think AT&T would be sure the app was functioning properly so people could spend money with them, open new accounts, etc., But instead this app literally never works right. It always crashes. It's just garbage. Which reflects AT&T well because none of their stuff ever works. Their service is garbage. And their CUSTOMER SERVICE is even worse. This is so sub par. Verizon is far superior in every way. Unfortunately I live in the woods and AT&T is only one that works

title: Gods of Rome
description:
An epic fighting game set in an age of myth and legend that shows you exactly what your mobile device is capable of!
The souls of the most powerful gods have been summoned to brutal battle. Fight to restore peace in the most graphically amazing game for mobile. A pantheon of champions is yours to train to new heights and take to war as you enter an epic story full of daily challenges, mystical prizes and PvP combat.
‚óÜ STUNNING NEXT-GEN 3D GRAPHICS & ART
Gods of Rome pushes the limits of the mobile platform by offering the best 3D graphics possible on a mobile device.
‚óÜ INTUITIVE TAP & SWIPE CONTROLS
Enjoy an experience tailored to the mobile platform ‚Äì the entire screen is at your disposal, with fluid Tap & Swipe controls that deliver merciless chain attacks and combos!
‚óÜ SUMMON THE WORLD‚ÄôS GREATEST WARRIORS
Join the lofty ranks of THE ASCENDERS ‚Äì the supreme summoners of ancient legend!
As an Ascender, you can summon, upgrade, and manage gods, monsters, heroes and other mythical warriors in a blood fight against a dark force that threatens to enslave them all!
- Greek and Roman gods such as Zeus, Hades, Vulcan, Atlas, Medusa, Spartacus the gladiator, and many more form the most powerful gathering of fighters the world has ever seen!
- Undertake your journey through the ancient world's most incredible locations ‚Äì Mount Olympus, the ruins of Pompeii, the Coliseum, and many more!
- Discover the unique Bonds shared by your fighters to unlock powerful bonuses.
‚óÜ FIGHT TO BECOME LEGEND
Explore exciting world maps where formidable new opponents wait to challenge your fighting skills‚Ä¶
Begin your quest to defeat the dark demon Tenebrous, an ancient evil who has unearthed the artifact known as the Chaos Vessel. As he threatens to enslave the world‚Äôs greatest warriors with its power, only the mighty summoners known as "The Ascenders" can rise up against his new regime!
‚óÜ RISE TO THE CHALLENGE
Engage in online VS battles and PvP Events to conquer your challengers; win rewards, upgrade your pantheon with new abilities and special moves, and become the top-ranking Ascender!
‚óÜ UNLOCK MYSTICAL PRIZES
Win Spheres to discover the loot and treasures within: rare fighters, gems, valuable resources and other amazing rewards!

Find out more about the game on the official site -- http://www.godsofromegame.com/

Visit our official site at http://gmlft.co/website_EN
Check out the new blog at http://gmlft.co/central

comments: This is one of the best games Gameloft has created and entertained the world. MUST READ: I have been playing this game since it's release and have grown watching its updates and its growth. I have played it since then on the PC. And now I restarted it on Phone This game is one of the best games till date and needs frequent updates and upgrades, please let the world experience more of amazing events, dear Gameloft. Please spend some time and money on this game rather than making low budget Games.

Level 31 by now and... considering buying stuff. Game is surprisingly nice, fights are intense and graphics are excellent. There's a lot of ways the game could improve: controls could be better (more responsive commands, different commands for kicks and punches, maybe transparent and/ or physical buttons for these commands or so INSTEAD OF tapping and swiping), story mode lacks new chapters and new art for the menu (when choosing dungeons), but, generally, it's a great game... Keep updating.

Its one of the greatest game I have played its an online game but its not like other games where it lags... The problem is I can't log in my account hope gameloft can please help me I have spent quite some amount of money on my account, at first I thought it was my phone but when I changed to 2 other and it gave me the same problem the game just crashes at the loading screen!! Please help me get back my account

Awesome game . But now its is dead. No new fighter's no new PvP. And in sphere 6 fighter are missing. Please Gameloft give it New updates,and new pvp and fighter's. And give it missing fighter's in sphere. Please GoR. when we will get new pvp and update. In my phone game is not opening please fixed the errors. From 7 days my game is not opening showing errors. Fixed the errors and give new update please

I don't usually play the same game for a long time unlike this one, 'cause I like switching to new ones and so. But I've been playing it for over a month and I really loved the concept and and the over all graphics and stuff. But the reason for 4 stars is because the controls. They are simple but there are many times, the characters won't respond to the swiping or tapping. Also it started crashing recently. Everytime I play it, it crashes atleast once within a 15 to 40 minutes time gap.

title: Public Transport Simulator
description:
Bus Driving Games have gotten better over time, and so has Public Transoprt Simulator. There are over 48 different vehicles, so we are shure you will find your favorite to 
drive around in the immersive and detailed world. All vehicles are fully modeled and have realistic interior and exterior views with freelook feature. 
PTS has realistic physics, if you are a careless Bus Driver or crash your Bus 
and passengers will fall, resulting in you losing experience. The Driving continues, after a cool action replay.
Finishing missions unlocks other Buses and vehicles that allow you to enjoy different gamemodes,
including Taxi Driver and Checkpoint Racing with a selection of sporty cars.
There are also leaderboards so you can see how you measure up against other Bus Drivers.
Happy Driving everybody!

comments: It's a decent game, however when I approach a red light, and don't go through it, it says I went through it and I lose XP for no reason. Another note, Can you add sound mods for the passengers to communicate, and add ticket machines to use, it would be realistic and a better experience. It would be cool if you terminated at a bus station, and had timetables, for when you next leave and approach a bus stop. If you could add a button to click called "Driver Shift" which you click, (optional).

Great game but there might not be traffic if they can they should add sort of realistic traffic and one more bus a Triple decker with 4 wheels on each side at back and front 2 on each side. So if you can do that this will be the best and most comfortable game to play but it is very comfortable already. Thank you. And I hope you can do it soon.

It's a great game, but it needs some tweaking: 1. Passengers seem to fall off their seats quite easily, especially when going around corners. 2.Traffic and pedestrians don't always seem to be aware of their surroundings. 3. Being very close to traffic lights triggers the game into thinking I'm running a red light. 4. The vehicle selection menu would be much easier to use if it were tile/card-based. Other than that, I've thoroughly enjoyed playing the game! I hope to see more buses in the future.

This is a good bus simulator but there are a few things I wish could change, these are: I wish the rain graphics would be better, the people graphics would be better, I wish there would be more controls for example: being able to turn the cabin lights on/off, the air conditioning on/off etc. And I've noticed a bug with the game, when I slow down and the press on the gas pedal it says I crashed it's very annoying and finally I wish there would be buses on the road and the passengers would talk

This game is pretty decent overall, I like the XP system and the bus models and so on, what I don't like is very petty and can hopefully be easily solved. 1. The AI sometimes put the hazards on and brakecheck you then making your passengers fall over. 2. I would like to see the route creation system work better and 3. I wish you could put letters in the route number, apart from that this game is amazing! Thumbs up to the devs!

comments: I enjoy the overall gameplay. And while the pop ups can be a little annoying, it's called advertising. That's pretty standard for anything that's free. But was a little disappointed about a week ago when i had over 50 million in chips disappear when i logged back in. It apparently restarted or something and I was now back to a beginner and given the tutorial again.

I have reached out to support team multiple times still no results. I've screenshot we're while plying on a table, the game just went blurry and you can clearly see bars meaning my internet connection is good. It's very disappointing because people spend money to just lose hand on a technicality. I had double Aces and then my game blurred out and came back but my time ran out. Please fix the bug and make sure they respond to my email. I feel that I email about the problem that they stopped respo

I've been playing this game on this network app. For about six or seven yrs. Now it helps me out alot because I had a gambling problem it's my therply I go gambling in a bar anymore and I stay out of trouble as well.Besides that I've always enjoyed playing other players on line and beating thier dumb ass when they know u don't have alot of chips so they keep going all in , just so they can say they are better then u ,but the fact is it's not how u are suppose to win that way not up & up, is it!

Fun game, but chip packages are wildly over priced. Games against dealer have to be rigged. Normal games feel fair. Almost impossible to continue to meet missions and enjoy challenges without spending a lot of money. The flurry of "sale" spam when you log in is excessive.

There is a whole mess of problems with this app. Every single time I turn off auto re-up and auto rebuy it does it anyway. Often times my hand will just up and fold and all chips I've put in are lost. The randomness of cards is questionable and the concept of momentum is lost on me. What is momentum? The longer you stay in the better your odds are? So if that's the case not random? And last but not least every single ad is ridiculously expensive and they appear constantly. Not real poker.

title: Pregnant Mother Simulator - Virtual Pregnancy Game
description:
I'm Pregnant üë©‚Äç‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçüë© . The story of pregnant mother starts from the pregnancy test in this amazing pregnant simulator. With motherhood news you are now a pregnant mommy. 
Experience real life simulation in giving birth games and family games.

ü©∏ Virtual Pregnancy Video Game: Virtual Pregnant simulator depicits the life game story of a mother right from the start of the pregnancy. Pregnant mom is so excited about the newborn üë∂üèº. She has to take care of herself for babycare. 

ü©∏ Pregnant Mom Life:  She now has to follow a managed life in 1st, 2nd and third trimesters. In first trimester she has to rest avoid stairs and take necessary precautions to avoid miscarriage. 
2nd trimester she has to start workouts pregnancy workouts and pregnancy yoga exercises has to performed in her daily routine along with a healthy diet. 

ü©∏ Childbirth Games: Pregnant games for girls normal delivery. Grow your family in this mother simulator game. Pregnant daycare routine must be followed that includes; Having enough sleep, doing yoga and exercises, taking your vitamins and following a healthy diet plan. Being pregnant and babycare isn't an easy task. Check with your pregnancy doctor games. Take plenty of fruits üçè. 
In this babysitting game mommy & newborn baby checkup is very important as it can lead to many complications. As a babysitter keep checking blood pressure
and Blood sugar levels of the pregnant mom to monitor her health and normal growth of baby.

Features:
‚òÖ A mother game who will perform her daily activities after being pregnant. 
‚òÖ Pregnancy test and doctor visit for routine checkup. 
‚òÖ Brisk Walking and other pregnancy exercises in this mom game. 
‚òÖ Taking healthy diet and monitoring baby growth. 
‚òÖ Complete pregnancy period to parenthood.  
‚òÖ Medical care of Pregnant Mama. 
‚òÖ Patient mama's clothes and other accessories during parenthood period. 
‚òÖ Be prepared for the pregnant mama emergancy doctor in case of Cesarean.

üëçüèª Your newborn baby will be active if you are active. Go to the hospital and meet your doctor in this hospital game. This is a family game, a mother game, a hospital game and
 ultimately an amazing pregnancy game as you will be going through all these phases of experience in a fun and realistic way. 

üëçüèª Pregnancy To-dos in this fun game of 2020. One of the best simulation games 2020. Pregnant surgery game will end at your delivery day. Regularly visit your 
pregnancy doctor in this hospital game. You must also be prepared for the hospital emergency for the labor just in case you get into any complications. Also keep your
maternity bag ready. Be a good pregnant mommy. 

Don't forget to give your feedback at neelumbajiplc@gmail.com

comments: This game is ok I would never play this in my freetime, and I don't like the animaton. It's terrible and the animation sucks! It looks like the creator just rushed it when it could have been a good game but you rushed it. If your pregnant and you want to learn about being pregnant I do recommend, but for all of you that are not, look at something else!!!

The is perfect for pregnant women. It teaches you everything i am very proud of the creators. But the reason i reduced a star because you cannot operate the woman that's a little disappointing. Creators if you are reading this its a humble request to add this feature please please. I love this game and i dont want to uninstall it.

Very good game...portrays a pregnant mother's life accurately. Excellent! The only thing is that I felt the 'Baby Care' level a bit boring. The rest was all excellent! Going to hospital, ordering items from iPhone....very good. Just improve 'Baby Care' level and then include more and more of levels...overall, nice game!üëçüëç sufficient to get 4 stars!!

FINALLY A GAME WITH EASY CONTROLS !!!!!! I love this game I just wish it had more levels and more to do so far everything is so accurate! Maybe giving baby a bath more levels of baby getting older feeding him in a high chair changing clothes etc mom cooking going to the store taking baby for a walk in stroller or if baby grows and walks as a toddler take him to play ! I'm just glad theres no timer either ! I totally love this game so I'll keep it downloaded and wait for more levels ! Great game!

This app is amazing the little details are so incredible! It feels so realistic however there are some small issues in my opinion I don't understand why when you buy clothes on the pregnancy app it shows dresses and a t-shirt, if she can only wear the track suits why not just have her buy the track suits instead of the dresses? Also it's a little annoying that when you have a baby boy he's in a super girly nursery I think all the baby stuff should had been made gender neutral. Great game tho!

title: Real Cricket‚Ñ¢ 17
description:
Real Cricket‚Ñ¢ is here and here to stay! We have migrated to a brand new experience with Real Cricket‚Ñ¢ 17! The most complete cricket game in the world! 
For all you cricket fans out there, Intensity of a Real Cricket‚Ñ¢ game, now on your mobile!!!
Welcome to the most authentic, complete and surreal Cricket experience on Android - Real Cricket‚Ñ¢ 17

ALL NEW MULTIPLAYER
Battle it out against your friends or other Real Cricket players in a Batting Showdown. Outscore your peers and top the leaderboards!

PREMIER LEAGUE AUCTIONS
Just like next year ‚Äì take charge of your favourite franchise and build a team from scratch!

INCLUDES TEST MATCH
Brand new Test Series mode complete with updated rosters, the classic whites and lunch-tea breaks.

CHAMPIONS CUP
Be part of the Mini World Cup gala and bring the trophy home for your country!

UNIQUE AND NOVEL REAL CRICKET CHALLENGE MODE & DAILY CHALLENGES
For the First Time Players can play out Historical Scenarios with a unique level based saga experience. Also get daily challenges based on recent and past events!

ALL MAJOR T20 DOMESTIC TOURNAMENTS
More content than you can imagine. From South Africa, the Caribbean, Down Under, England, Pakistan, Bangladesh. Play them All

ALL NEW PLAYER PROFILE
Track all yours Stats and Increase you‚Äôre Rank. Be the Best

FRESH LOOK AND FEEL	
The game is now smoother than ever and with the most stunning presentation.

ULTRA FLUID SIGNATURE REAL CRICKET‚Ñ¢ ANIMATIONS
Scintillating 2D Motion Captured animations

BE STRIKING WITH AUTHENTIC CRICKET EQUIPMENT
Authentic Cricket equipment provided by legendary manufacturers ‚Äì Gray-Nicolls and SS Cricket. 

CRICKET QUIZ
New for Trivia maniacs. Think you know it All? Test your skills with the Cricket Quiz

ALL NEW DETAILED LEADERBOARDS
Now Compete with Friends & Players from around the World
 
ALL NEW HARDCORE DIFFICULTY
Want the Game to Be Harder. Well we tried! It‚Äôs your turn now‚Ä¶

This app offers in-app purchases.

*Permissions:
To deliver the best experience we would need some permissions from our users:

GET_ACCOUNTS: This permission is required to access Google Game Play Services including Login, Achievements and Leaderboard.

WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE and READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: We need these permissions to cache and read game content during the gameplay.

READ_PHONE_STATE: We need this permission to serve you relevant notifications on various updates and offers.

ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION: We need this permission to detect your location so as to provide region specific content as well as analyze your regions needs and feedback better.

title: Hit & Knock down
description:
When you hit the target with a ball, the target knocks down or explodes.
Achieve the stage score to clear then challenge the next level.

[Game modes]
- Ball limit mode: Hit the can, Break dishes, Score target, Hit the fruit 
- Time limit mode: Hit the folder target, Shoot the parachute, Hit the oil drums, Hit the roly-poly toy

[Features]
- Enjoy the various game modes with simple control.
- Various balls supported (baseball ball, bowling bowl, volleyball, soccer ball, billiard ball)
- Challenge mode: the road to the world best record.
- Offline mode supported.
- Multiplayer mode supported.
- 16 languages supported.
- Achievement & leaderboard supported.

title: Creative Destruction
description:
Creative Destruction is a sandbox survival game that features the utmost fun of building and firing. 

In the mood for a heart-stirring showdown? You will parachute into a vast battlefield where 100-player deathmatch is raging. Outplay your way to be the last one standing.

Build the best, break the rest! Jump straight in this do-or-die battle where you can wield creative weapons, race against snowstorms, and unleash your inner beast.

Varied gameplay modes, weather and time systems bring a new level of hectic fun. Whether you fight like a lone wolf or team up, there are always surprises waiting to be explored!

Come embark on a winner-takes-all slugfest in Creative Destruction today and show‚Äôem what you could be.
