title: Off The Road - OTR Open World Driving
description:
Hello Offroaders! The new open world off-road driving simulator is here! It's time to get Off The Road!

Drive your rig on the hills of your own open world, get into a boat and explore islands, pick a helicopter and fly freely to the top of the mountains or just walk around if you need a peaceful hike it's up to you. 

Beat challenges to earn money and upgrade your car. Make it stronger, faster, look more awesome!
Earn xp to level up and get cool rewards. 


[DRIVE ANYWHERE]
Using your car's winch you can climb the highest mountains, nothing can stop you. Thanks to the accurate rope physics the cable rope behaves realistically. You can drive boats to travel the sea or fly a helicopter to get anywhere easily.

[SIMULATION]
Realistic damage model for vehicles. Falls, crashes deform your car's chassis. Tyre pressure is simulated, tires deform based on load. Simulated water ripples, buoyancy etc.

[CHALLENGES]
Try to be fast to beat the Checkpoint Hunt challenges, use your off-roading skills to reach checkpoints in Pathfinder challenges. Find and transport the required materials for Transport challenges!

[TRANSPORTATION]
Use trailers to transport materials to their destinations, or use your winch to attach to objects in the world and drag them around freely.

[CONSTRUCTION]
Construct houses, bridges, roads, vehicles by transporting the required materials to the site!

[VEHICLES]
Drive off-road 4x4 cars, trucks, off-road behemoths, boats, helicopters!

[MUD PHYSICS]
Dynamic mud surface that deforms. You can find muddy fields to get your car dirty. Chassis can get muddy and dirty, you can wash it by driving into water or repairing.

Features:
-Explore beautiful landscapes
-22 off-road cars to unlock and drive
-Driveable boats, helicopters
-Tons of challenges to beat
-Collect card packs to unlock new cars
-Tons of collectables
-Physically simulated water
-Climb hills
-Transport goods
-Beat challenges
-Endless fun

descriptionHTML:
Hello Offroaders! The new open world off-road driving simulator is here! It's time to get Off The Road!

Drive your rig on the hills of your own open world, get into a boat and explore islands, pick a helicopter and fly freely to the top of the mountains or just walk around if you need a peaceful hike it's up to you.

Beat challenges to earn money and upgrade your car. Make it stronger, faster, look more awesome!
Earn xp to level up and get cool rewards.


[DRIVE ANYWHERE]
Using your car's winch you can climb the highest mountains, nothing can stop you. Thanks to the accurate rope physics the cable rope behaves realistically. You can drive boats to travel the sea or fly a helicopter to get anywhere easily.

[SIMULATION]
Realistic damage model for vehicles. Falls, crashes deform your car's chassis. Tyre pressure is simulated, tires deform based on load. Simulated water ripples, buoyancy etc.

[CHALLENGES]
Try to be fast to beat the Checkpoint Hunt challenges, use your off-roading skills to reach checkpoints in Pathfinder challenges. Find and transport the required materials for Transport challenges!

[TRANSPORTATION]
Use trailers to transport materials to their destinations, or use your winch to attach to objects in the world and drag them around freely.

[CONSTRUCTION]
Construct houses, bridges, roads, vehicles by transporting the required materials to the site!

[VEHICLES]
Drive off-road 4x4 cars, trucks, off-road behemoths, boats, helicopters!

[MUD PHYSICS]
Dynamic mud surface that deforms. You can find muddy fields to get your car dirty. Chassis can get muddy and dirty, you can wash it by driving into water or repairing.

comments: Fun and addicting game! I really dont like the first person camera view. I see more vehicle then anything else. I also noticed a glitch when taking a log, rock or car to a build or challenge circle. Sometimes it won't release the item in the circle. The turning controls, especially on the helicopters, could use some work too. But other then that! I love it! Needs more maps!

Good game. With only 5 maps, unfortunately, need more maps to make this game more interesting. Wide terrain for each map, with so many mini games inside each of map. To bad we only get to hold 3 card slot, with so many out there to collect. Take too long to get another vehicle unless we paid, but all and all, this game make me want to play every time.

This game is one of the best off road games and yes it looks better then you think too it has really good realistic sounds and lots of things to do and the truck you start out with is a some and sounds good it also has a realistic damage model on all the cars and all I can say is a game like this is hard to find on the play store it's like something you would get on a PC or game system

Nice game, but it needs some simple additions such as adding some people to the game because I feel lonely in the game. Or I feel that it lacks some natural things, such as some animals, such as some birds. And make the weather in the game change with time. And something like day and night will make the game more beautiful. It misses some simple things, but those things will give more beauty to the game

This games honestly got a lot packed into it for a free game and although the grinds do force you to become a grinding sloth it's still fairly enjoyable. no idea how I'm going to collect 300 let alone 2500 cards for a vehicle when there's at least 60 vehicles and you only get 5 or so cards for a vehicle at a time (and it takes 8hrs). would be worth it for a once off 6.99, even $12 purchase. Catch is, you're gonna have to cough up 6.99 every month if you want to try all the vehicles "for free"

title: Google Authenticator
description:
Google Authenticator generates 2-Step Verification codes on your phone.

2-Step Verification provides stronger security for your Google Account by requiring a second step of verification when you sign in. In addition to your password, you‚Äôll also need a code generated by the Google Authenticator app on your phone.

Learn more about 2-Step Verification: https://g.co/2step

Features:
* Generate verification codes without a data connection
* Google Authenticator works with many providers & accounts
* Dark theme available
* Automatic setup via QR code
* Transfer accounts between devices via QR code

Permission notice:
Camera: Needed to add accounts using QR codes

developerAddress: 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View 94043
recentChanges:
* Added the ability to transfer accounts to a different device, e.g. when switching phones
* Refreshed the look and feel of the app
comments: Great App for total piece of mind. However, if you "dump" your phone, like I just did, you have to reinitialize the Authenticator on each and every website you had it enabled just as if you had changed your phone or phone number. I forgot to make a list of each of my websites I was using the App on, so I'm having to "discover" them as I access them. Yeah, it's a pain, but if it wasn't, the App would be nothing but window dressing.

Another application that helps me make Google that much easier, faster and more convenient for me. I am so glad to see that Google is getting more and more usefer friendly ~ anyone who is interested in learning more about how to use, find or become an expert in the any subject go to "Google Education". üôÉ Basically, the authenticor is a great place to use as a second sign in step. It is paperless easy to find, get and use. I am so glad to be able to use this link for my own 2 step varifacation

When I first downloaded this app it worked great. I changed phones and the directions to switch were a little hard to follow but doable. This last update messed my app up because my phone died and I had to replace it. I was able to update it through my Gmail but codes were not working for apps. My old phone doesn't work so no way to transfer from it. I was able to get into FB and turn it off through my laptop. Otherwise I couldn't use it or messenger on my phone.

Make it clear that your accounts don't transfer over to a new device like every other Google app, as I am now locked out of my accounts frantically digging around trying to recover them. It's great at protecting your account but if you lose your device, or get a new one and forget to manually transfer them over I wish you luck.

The worst app which Google has ever created. Do they not ever considered what happened to those customers whom lost their phones? how are we able to transfer an old accounts if the previous phones were LOST. You, Google, has locked me out of several accounts and offer no other options available of unlocking it. This is a shameful act. Do not use this!

title: PlayStation App
description:
CONNECT TO PLAYERS AND  GAMES

Take your PlayStation experience with you wherever you go! Stay connected to your gaming friends and the games you love to play, see who's online, and discover the latest titles on PlayStation Store.

With PlayStation App, you can:
‚Ä¢ See which of your friends are online and what they're playing.
‚Ä¢ Receive notifications, game alerts, and invitations.
‚Ä¢ Customize your profile.
‚Ä¢ View progress and compare trophies.
‚Ä¢ Keep up with the latest activities from your friends and profiles you're following.
‚Ä¢ Get games and add-ons at PlayStation Store, and push them to your PS4 so they're ready when you get home.

A Sony Entertainment Network account is required to use this app.
A PS4 is required to use some of this app's features.

recentChanges: Our latest release has minor fixes and tweaks.
comments: Mine is fine but there are reports of people experiencing issues with updating. When they update the app it is still the old build and not the new one. If you uninstall and reinstall the app it is still the old one. There are a reports of people on Reddit experiencing the same issues. A friend of mine has the same issue he had a Samsung GS20+ Android 10 and it won't update to the latest version and he's not alone.

The layout is much better but functionality wise it's worse. The store doesn't allow you to filter so you can't separate dlc from games. Also trying to access my account details (Transaction History, Redeem Code) also doesn't work. I'm prompted for a username and password and keep getting a "Connection to the server could not be established error".

New UI is a really mixed bag. It's overall much snappier and the pull down menu for chat and friends is great. However, the new store is terrible! I used to love checking out sales on the app, but its a huge pain now since they completely removed filters like sort by price or alphabetically. Also they bafflingly don't show game titles in plain text anymore(only box art) and some are really hard to read if the text is too small.

New update to the PS Store is a major downgrade. Wishlists are gone which is what I used to keep track of the games I wanted to buy. Browsing through the store is slow and painful now that they only show you box covers instead of easy to read text. Many box covers are hard to read and don't differentiate between full games and addons. This new layout is going lead to me purchasing a much smaller number of games in the future do to the new increased difficulty of finding anything.

The integration of the ps store is great to see as well. I don't know if I'm blind tho but it's a shame the wishlist isn't in the app. Edit: From 4 to 3 stars Also comparing trophies isn't possible anymore and it seems they really emphasized their blogs now. Not everyone reads articles. If you have given special treatment towards the people who like reading articles, hopefully you'd bring back the basic ones you haven't included and removed.

title: Clue: Period Tracker, Ovulation, Cycle & Pregnancy
description:
Clue is more than a period tracker ‚Äì it‚Äôs an accurate menstrual calendar, ovulation app, and pregnancy tracker that helps you take control of your reproductive health. It‚Äôs a scientific and fluff-free way to learn about your body and discover unique patterns in your menstrual cycle.  

With the Clue app, your periods, symptoms, fertility and pregnancy are all in one place. Great skin when you ovulate? Headaches during PMS? Learn about your personal patterns with 30+ tracking options from birth control pills to cramps, emotions, skin, moods, cervical fluid, and more. Plus, set reminders so you never get surprised by a period again. Clue is the period calendar, fertility tracker and pregnancy app that adapts to you and your unique cycle: the more you track, the more you learn, and the more you start to live in sync with your biology. 

** Top free period tracker app ‚Äì Obstetrics & Gynecology Journal (ACOG) **
** Best Fertility Apps 2020 ‚Äì Healthline **

CLUE PERIOD & OVULATION TRACKER TOP FEATURES:
¬∑ Period tracker, period calendar, ovulation tracker, and fertility tracker
¬∑ Accurate period predictions for upcoming cycles
¬∑ Log your symptoms, flow, moods and more and find patterns in your cycle
¬∑ Ovulation app to track ovulation tests and your BBT 
¬∑ Calendar reminders for upcoming periods, ovulation and PMS
¬∑ Predictions for your recurring symptoms, like cramps, pain, and headaches
¬∑ A period calendar with your menstruation, ovulation and fertile days
¬∑ Log and set birth control pill reminders
¬∑ A cycle analysis of your period lengths to observe trends and irregular cycles
¬∑ Menstrual health tips curated for you that explain your symptoms 

PERIOD TRACKER & MENSTRUAL CALENDAR 
¬∑ Period predictions, fertile day and ovulation estimates 
¬∑ A period diary to log your period days, flow intensity and the menstrual products you use
¬∑ Track symptoms, cravings, pain, exercise, and more to find patterns in your cycle
¬∑ Set up calendar reminders before your next period, ovulation, fertile window and PMS 

OVULATION TRACKER & FERTILITY TRACKER: 
¬∑ Ovulation calculator and basal body temperature tracker
¬∑ Fertility predictions and fertility friend to help you get pregnant if you‚Äôre trying to conceive
¬∑ Log ovulation test and cervical fluid for improved ovulation estimations
¬∑ Set fertility and ovulation calendar reminders to help plan a pregnancy

*NEW* PREGNANCY TRACKER & WEEK BY WEEK GUIDE
¬∑ Log into pregnancy mode to set your expected due date with a pregnancy calculator
¬∑ A pregnancy calendar and baby growth tracker to keep track of your trimester 
¬∑ Track pregnancy symptoms, baby movement, and more 
¬∑ Fact-checked health content to guide you through your pregnancy week by week so you know what to expect

FIND UNIQUE PATTERNS IN YOUR MENSTRUAL CYCLE
¬∑ View your period lengths and cycle variations
¬∑ See the symptoms you tracked in relation to your menstrual cycle
¬∑ Use Clue to help you manage your PCOS and irregular cycles
¬∑ Started menstruating? Clue is a helpful period tracker for teens
¬∑ Bring the Clue Period Tracker app to your OBGYN and have your period history available

Clue is a cycle tracker built for anyone who menstruates and uses gender-neutral language.

Note: Clue Period Tracker & Ovulation app should not be used as a contraceptive.

Helloclue.com ‚Äì Menstrual cycle encyclopedia and resource for  period, fertility, birth control, sex, and LGBTQIA topics.

tiktok.com/@clueapp
helloclue.com/hormonal

1. "More" menu 
2. Support
3. Choose the topic of your inquiry

summary: A helpful guide to your body: period tracker, menstrual calendar & pregnancy app
developerAddress: Adalbertstra√üe 8, 10999 Berlin
recentChanges:
Welcome to the world, pregnancy mode! Our most requested feature is finally here! Now, you can switch from period to pregnancy tracking by upgrading to Clue Plus.
- Log your pregnancy and set your due date in a new pregnancy calendar
- Track your baby‚Äôs growth week by week, and log your pregnancy and postpartum symptoms
- Receive science-backed insights on what to expect each week
- Access extensive in-app content to help you navigate through each trimester and postpartum
comments: I've been using Clue for a solid 5 years now, and I really like the app. I've only had issues with the new update. The app has been throwing me out sometimes when I press the "back" button. Also, whenever I try to reorder my tracking options to my taste, it doesn't register them and shifts them back to the original, unwanted order. I also don't like that the "track today's data" button on the centre of the cycle got removed. It was super convenient and I'd want it back. Otherwise love the app.

Please help! This app is amazing but it's starting to be weird!- Basically, it keeps tracking stuff on its own and it changes everything. It completely destroyed everything in my cycle! It made the period length from 5 days (which I am) to 1.5 days! And it keeps tracking to heavy bleeding etc when I'm not bleeding at all! I love this app so much and I really need it to work. Why does it do this? What can I do about it? Did someone possibly "hack" me without knowing and starting tracking?

Easy to use and unobtrusive experience. I haven't gotten enough cycles yet for symptom predictions, but just the act of tracking them has gotten me in better touch with what's going on. The app has useful information as well. I am not subscribed and just using the free version. I'll think about subscribing when I see how the experience is with predictions.

Edit: yes! The lock is 'fixed'! I now need to punch in my pin everytime I navigate to a different screen in the app instead of just once! Great work guys! /sarcasm. This app has gotten really pushy with trying to get you to pay to the point I want to uninstall. To top it off , the password lock is no longer functioning even though it's on in my settings.

Idk what they did to the app because after an update around september, it startes crashing when i tried to use certain features. I knew it wasnt my phone because many people complained about the same issue around the same time and I was hoping they'd fix it. Instead, the problem got progressively worse to the point where i get error messages telling me the app isn't working or that it needs to close when it's already supposedly closed. Years lost cause now I can't even get my data back. Trash.

title: Dune!
description: Jump above the line to score, but beware! The higher you get, the harder the landing will be! Don't crash and keep it smooth!

- Stability improvements
comments: So I rate two stars because 1 the ads! When you die, you will have the option of reviving yourself in exchange for an ad. And even when you choose not to watch the ad, you will still get one. It seems like these kind of games are always slow and buggy and glitchy and it makes my 1 year old phone seem like it's 10 years old. And 2 for some odd reason, right in the middle of the game, it will get laggier and laggier until it all of a sudden freezes and then closes the app like nothing happened.

This game is pretty good for a momentum based game, unfortunately the business practices of the company that made it are pretty wack. My primary issue is that when you fail you are given the option to revive yourself for watching an ad, pretty standard stuff. However, even when you choose not to watch an ad, 9 times out of 10 you'll still be given one! Frankly, it's annoying and makes me not want to even bother playing.

This game has so much potential but falls short of creativity. Once you unlock all the balls and dunes there's literally nothing else to do but jump dunes. I'm not trying to over complicate a simple game but having some mini games, more challenges or maybe even battle mode (competing with 4 others to see who can go further or higher) would be awesome! I would even pay for that

I would hace had fun but no. They have to fill it with ads. The only reason i get mad when i die is not because i died. But because i will have to sit through an ad. The game would be fun but nah. Inside the creators minds is all like "hah u thought the game was supposed to be good? You must be insane! Its just to stuff our wallets with money u dumbo!"

I feel like the hate this game is getting is a tad undeserved. It's a really good and fun game. Even though it's pretty simple, it never gets old! The ads though. That's probably the reason so many people dislike this game. Other than that it is an amazing and addictive game. Just tone down on the ads, and it's an easy 5 star!

title: Injustice: Gods Among Us
description:
Build an epic roster of DC super heroes and villains and get ready for battle! INJUSTICE: GODS AMONG US is a free-to-play collectible card game where you build a roster of characters, moves, powers, and gear and enter the arena in touch-based 3-on-3 action combat.

FIGHT
Use the touch screen mechanics of your mobile device to battle your enemies in 3-on-3 action combat. Swipe and tap to perform combos and build your power to pull off special attacks and super moves taken straight from the console version of the game.

LEVEL UP
Build your move set, increase your powers, upgrade your characters and gear, and beat your competition. Constantly evolve your card collection to fit your style of play and put your best team forward as you take on a series of DC super hero and villian combatants.z

ONLINE MULTIPLAYER
Take on real opponents in Online Multiplayer Battles. Compete against players worldwide on the leaderboards, and in tournaments filled with awesome rewards. Watch replays of your previous offensive and defensive battles to hone your skills and your team lineup. Lead your team to victory!

MASSIVE ROSTER
Collect and play as your favorite DC Comics icons: Superman, Batman, Wonder Woman, The Joker, Green Arrow, Flash, Bane, Green Lantern, Doomsday, and many others. With each alternate version of these iconic characters you get a new set of powers and moves, and a whole new fight!

AMAZING GRAPHICS
Delivers best-in-class graphics on your phone or tablet, with custom animations for every single super hero and villain. Take the battle to Arkham Asylum, the Batcave, The Watchtower, and other iconic locales from DC Comics, fully rendered in 3D.


Please Note: INJUSTICE: GODS AMONG US is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money.

comments: It's a great app, it doesn't take that long to master, the community is great (especially on the reddit, it's full of players helping eachother), and when you're ready to tackle the weekly challenge, you get a great free character! I've been playing since about late July, and I already have about 6-7 gold characters, the majority I got for free! Also, the MP mode is a little off-balance, since the Nth Metal characters screw it over, but it's still just an incredibly fun game.

In my oppinion, this is by far one of the best free to play mobile games of all time. Game was highly unstable when I picked it up, patches have greatly improved performance and crashes are rare now. There is an offline mode, survival mode, and online battle mode, in addition to the relatively new "breakthrough" and "phantomzone" modes for increased unlock potential. Also, did I mention there are zero ads??!! I do think the new Nth metal heroes are slightly overpowered, and expensive to level.

A simplified version of the console game. Fighting animations are smooth (compared to the second one). It might be just my phone but there is something robotic and off with the injustice 2 mobile fighting animations that doesnt feel normal compared to this one. Gameplay is simple.You get to play, collect and level up your favorite DC characters on the go. Having this game available offline is very convenient too. Granting easy access so that you can continue grinding even without wifi.

This game is awsome the fighting is simple and easy to understand and the range of characters and their depictions are super cool. The only thing that would make it better is if they had updated the graphics and save system instead of making a whole new game that is not as fun in my opinion because of the massive amount of commands you have to memorize inorder to fight.

Good game, only problem is the survival rules regarding changing characters. How is putting a character in and subbing them out to maybe use later regarded as an elimination, huh. I lost 20K coins and some other stuff, all because I mistakenly put a character I didn't want to put at the time and confirmed before going back to change it. When I finally lost, I was banking on using it to clear round 9 before cashing out. Alas dumb rules cost me. MXM what a stupid rule, seriously.

title: Children's doctor : dentist.
description:
Children's doctor - we all love when people around us smile. We become well and happy when someone on the street gives us a smile. But for a smile to be beautiful, you need to take good care of your teeth. This applies to your pets, because in childhood they were for every kid. Like people, they also sometimes need to treat their teeth. This can be done by a special doctor - dentist.¬†
We present to your attention an exciting game for children - a dentist (vet clinic).¬†
In this entertaining game, your child is a real dentist, under the guidance of which there is a hospital for animals. The kid is entrusted with a very important and responsible task - the treatment of teeth of his four-footed pups, whose teeth began to ache heavily because of their love for sweets.
¬†
You have to treat them in a real dental office, use various medical instruments, such as tongs, scalpels, Burmashin and many others, to clean your four-legged friends of teeth from plaque, align them, do operations, remove cavities and fill them. After all, they all just need your help. For her, the animals will be grateful to you and very grateful.
¬†
Developing games for children, such as a veterinarian, contribute to the overall development of your child. They help to develop fine motor skills, coordination of movements, visual perception, attentiveness and observation, will show the baby how to treat animals, take care of them.
¬†
Our games for kids, such as a dentist, will teach them not only to treat their pets with love and care, but also to protect their own teeth, do not forget to clean them several times a day, because going to the dentist is not the most pleasant pastime.
¬†
For the purpose of comprehensive development of the child, we create applications and educational games for children that are aimed to help boys and girls develop basic motor and other skills, and also have fun, fun and useful to spend their free time.
¬†
All you need is to download games, install and start playing, and in the future your child can choose one of the most needed professions in the world - the dentist
¬†
Be sure to visit our http://yovogames.com and also we are at:
Youtube: http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZruadkJJTuD4Bgb1F6pa3A
Twitter: https://twitter.com/YOVOstudio
Facebook: https://facebook.com/yovogames

comments: It's great for toddlers! But hey, parents, please PLEASE monitor you kid while playing this game. Ads pop up and they easily could tap on them. They range from insurance, to mattresses all the way to other games. So please, monitor your child! But everything else aside, the game is great. It's repetitive, but kids like that.

I initially thought this app would not benefit my toddler in any way, plus I was a bit bothered overall. The thing is, I wasn't paying attention & pre-judged, I was wrong. As I sat with her & watched her smiling ... I decided to join in & her concentration mixed with true laughter is all I could have asked for ! THANK YOU BY KEEPING IT SILLY FOR HER WHILE STILL PROVIDING AN HONEST LEARNING EXPERIENCE SHE'LL BENEFIT FROM !

Get rid of ads, please. Ads arent appropriate for toddlers. This is a great game, and my toddler can't play it without getting inappropriate ads or being prompted to download things. Such a shame, as she loves it.

The ad scrolling at the bottom on the screen is horrible. Every 10 seconds my 3 year old was accidently tapping it which sent it right into a full ad. She spent most of the time crying because it kept happening.
It would be more fun if there was more than 3 patients and different things to do but it is a great game also the advertisements every 10 seconds can stop anytime now that's very irritating

title: Drive for Speed: Simulator
description:
Gentlemen, start your engines! Get your car ready and start playing Drive for Speed Simulator. Drive your car through a city full of obstacles. Complete different missions around town before time runs out and try to earn as much money as you can. Use your money to buy brand new faster cars and complete missions in less time.

Drive for Speed Simulator also has a Free Ride mode to take advantage of its sandbox city. Drive around and have fun in this amazing game for Android. Download Drive for Speed Simulator now!

In Drive for Speed Simulator, choose among 20 different cars to buy and play. Customize your cars with different items: spoilers, tires, rims, paint and motor upgrades!

What are you waiting for? Start playing Drive for Speed Simulator now!

Features:
- More than 20 cars to play.
- Freeride mode in a sandbox city.
- 4 types of missions.
- Different accessories to customize your car.

title: Torque Burnout
description:
Torque Burnout is a 'driving' game which combines parts of every racing game!

Grip the wheel, put your foot to the floor and drive like a maniac, completing donuts and drifts like a champion.  Evolve your ride and push it to its limits, rally the crowd into a frenzy and then push it some more to reign supreme as the BURNOUT KING!

Features:
- Realistic burnout simulation complete with gorgeous smoke, bursting tires and flaming engines!
- A wide variety of cars each with unique handling and customization.
- Thundering engine sounds that will send chills down your spine.

Coming Soon:
- More cars.
- More challenges.

Notes: 
- 2012 model high end device or newer is recommended to play.
- A network connection is recommended but not required to play.
- Torque Burnout is free to play. In game credits can be purchased using real money via in-app purchases.

Any problems? Any questions? Any suggestions? We'd love to hear from you!

FACEBOOK: http://www.facebook.com/torqueburnout
TWITTER: http://twitter.com/leagueofmonkeys
YOUTUBE: http://youtube.com/theleagueofmonkeys
FORUM: http://leagueofmonkeys.com/forum
HOMEPAGE: http://leagueofmonkeys.com
FAQ: http://leagueofmonkeys.com/support/torqueburnout

The game requires access to the following permissions:
- Access to the devices Photos/Media/Files is required to use the screenshot feature.
- Access to the devices Phone is required for authentication of the apps social media features.

comments: I've got to say this game is sick. I really want more American muscle cars in it and maybe some classic trucks. But there are a few problems like the rims just turning orange and the tires catch on fire "like really" but the gameplay and controls are very good. It is also very difficult to unlock new cars if you dont just grind for hours upon hours. Please make it a little easier to unlock and buy cars. Also why do you have to buy the real life cars? Why cant i buy them with in game money.

Great game, ive been playing for a week now and I love it. Drifting feels real and you dont have To pay to win like most other games. The only thing i would make better are the engine idleing sounds in the garage and the revving sounds in game. Over all great game just those two things.

I have a problem. in real life when you're Tyre pops you're rim probably will blow cause of all the intense heat it's taking so add that to the game. a few more cars, and make it so that you're engine doesn't blow in like 1 minute that has been a big problem for me cause I always get my engine blown and have to drive a taxi. but over all its... A GOOD GAME!

The game is fab. You could add a bit of more Germand made cars, like for instance the BMW e30 325i. In South Africa its a well known car and in such a game you could actually get more people wanting to get the game. So try and add that and the proper engine sound for it and you will see how more people will be downloading this game

I rlly love this game, you guys put alot of effort in the fame but I'm unsatisfied with a feature not in the game, If its possible, can u make all the cars have custom features sucks as bumpers,hoods, side skirts, wings, ect. Thy which ive given 4 stars but i still like the game, and ive bought your products in game

title: Crown Mobile
description:
The Crown Mobile App brings campus to your fingertips and enables you to connect with Crown College. Stay on top of your events, classes and assignments with the built in calendar function, and get notified of important dates, deadlines & security announcements. Make friends, ask questions, and access campus resources at any time!

Some other exciting features include:

+ CLASSES: Manage classes, create to-dos & reminders, and stay on top of assignments.

+ EVENTS: Discover campus events, set reminders, and track your attendance

+ FEATURED ACTIVITIES: Orientation, Homecoming, etc.

+ CAMPUS COMMUNITY: Meet friends, ask questions, and keep up with what's happening on the campus wall.

+ GROUPS & CLUBS: Get involved with campus organizations and meet people with similar interests

+ CAMPUS SERVICES: Learn about services offered, such as Academic Advising, Financial Aid & Counselling.

+ PUSH NOTIFICATIONS: Receive important campus notifications and emergency alerts.

+ CAMPUS MAP: Find the quickest route to classes, events, and offices.

+ CAMPUS EXPERIENCE: Keep track of your co-curricular participation and provide feedback in real-time

title: Basketball Mania
description:
Attention basketball fanatics! Test your basketball practice and shot techniques in #1 Basketball game - Basketball Mania, a fun way to play Basketball!

Basketball Mania is a fast paced arcade basketball machine game with a built in ticket dispenser, where players are challenged to hit the target scores to move onto the next level and try to beat the highest score. The better the player is, the longer they are able to play!

You need to score as many points as possible within the given time. With each level cleared, the game play will change, with the level of difficulty increasing with each stage.

How to Play:
- Touch a ball and fling it towards the basket to shoot the ball

Game Features:
- Five unique skins: choose your favorite themed environment
- Great game sound effects & music
- Redemption ticket stars payout feature
- Side to side basket movement for challenging play
descriptionHTML:
Attention basketball fanatics! Test your basketball practice and shot techniques in #1 Basketball game - Basketball Mania, a fun way to play Basketball!

Basketball Mania is a fast paced arcade basketball machine game with a built in ticket dispenser, where players are challenged to hit the target scores to move onto the next level and try to beat the highest score. The better the player is, the longer they are able to play!

You need to score as many points as possible within the given time. With each level cleared, the game play will change, with the level of difficulty increasing with each stage.

How to Play:
- Touch a ball and fling it towards the basket to shoot the ball

Game Features:
- Five unique skins: choose your favorite themed environment
- Great game sound effects & music
- Redemption ticket stars payout feature
- Side to side basket movement for challenging play
summary: Test your basketball practice and shot techniques in #1 Basketball game!
developerAddress: Osiris International Cayman Limited, Suite #4-210, Govemors Square, 23 Lime Tree Bay Avenue, PO Box 32311, Grand Cayman KY1-1209, Cayman Islands

comments: My only complaint with this game is there is no more levels or skins to choose from. I have done everyone and I just want a bunch of new skins and themes like a Christmas one or different environmental ones just add new ones please then I will write it 5 stars
Very addictive!! brilliant graphics, there's nothing wrong with it, Big üëÜ up to whoever created it, I love that shouts when you score the ball, so thanks a lot.

This game is 50\50 My complaint is when u r playing an add pops up and blocks the a nasty game then the timer continiues counting then u get no tickets , and i know adults made these but what currency is tickets can't u guys use coins like every other game. Fix this glitches please
Awesome! Gives you a good concept of muscle memory, in my opinion. Great for super boring days too.

I have been playing this app on and off for about eight years now. But lately, they put a commercial on while your time is running. So about five to seven seconds is run off the clock before you can even start, they really need to fix this problem. It's extremely annoying!!

title: Real Steel Boxing Champions
description:
Build your Robot Fighting in this ultimate action and sports adventure. Unleash furious attacks in one-one combat using special moves, jabs, punches with legendary parts of your favorite heroes Atom, Zeus, Midas, NoisyBoy and new superstar Atom Prime.

Battle in the boxing realms with 1000s of unique robots and dominate 10 inspiring arenas in this epic sequel. Defeat the Legends of the New Real Steel Era & an All New Mysterious Super Boss to Reign Supreme as The Undisputable Champion!

BUILD YOUR CHAMPION 
Unleash your unique identity from 1500+ colossal robot parts of 32 Exclusive Robots. Choose from iconic Heads, massive Torsos and powerful Hands & Legs. Customize your Robots with exciting Paint, Intro that mimics your style and announces your unique Name to be acclaimed as the King Maker of Real Steel Champions!

UNLEASH HEROIC MOVES
Select devastating Heavy & Special Attacks, Ultimate Upgrades, Critical Hits and Finishers for your winning strategy.

comments: Amazing Game.I really love this game. But I am having an issue, I once tried to login with facebook but due to connectivity issue I couldn't so I closed the game and then started again with good internet connectivity but now whenever I start the game it just keep showing please wait... and won't start the game and if I turn off the internet then game works properly and even if I have good connection but though it is continuously shows that I am offline.

Its good and all but the last fight to win the zeus torso out of the three tasks i call them tast you have to do the one that it saes you have to beat the robot in 20sec but its to hard i cant upgrade my robot because i dont have enoff money to upgrade and you have to get all 15 rewards to get the torso i have 14 out of that 15

This is a great game and was one of the first games i ever played. I think they should have extended the Career/Campaign mode though.

title: Strawberry Shortcake Ice Cream Island
description:
Budge Studios‚Ñ¢ welcomes you to Ice-Cream Island! Join Strawberry Shortcake‚Ñ¢ and her friends on a berrylicious adventure to restore the island to its former glory! Drive your very own ice cream truck and prepare delicious treats from snow cones to milkshakes to banana splits! Scoop, swirl, shake and mix fabulous flavors and terrific toppings for all your customers to enjoy! It‚Äôs time to bring back the sunshine!

WELCOME TO ICE CREAM PARADISE

‚Ä¢ EXPLORE all of the island‚Äôs flavorful regions, from tropical jungles to snowy mountains!
‚Ä¢ SERVE and satisfy all sweet tooths with fast and flawless coordination
‚Ä¢ RACE against the clock to fill your clients‚Äô hearts!
‚Ä¢ COMBINE a ton of terrific toppings, fabulous flavors and sweet syrups!
‚Ä¢ UPGRADE your very own ice cream super-truck!
‚Ä¢ DECORATE the inside of your truck with lights, bobble heads and speakers!
‚Ä¢ MATCH your customers‚Äô order to make them happy
‚Ä¢ EARN golden stars and open cool crates and treasure chests
‚Ä¢ GET CREATIVE and mix ingredients endlessly in the Ice-Cream Lab!

6 CHARACTERS, EACH WITH HER OWN SUMMER TREATS AND AREA TO EXPLORE

‚Ä¢ STRAWBERRY SHORTCAKE: Swirling soft ice cream in Cool Breeze Coast Line
‚Ä¢ LEMON: Beautiful banana splits in Citrus Sands
‚Ä¢ ORANGE: Marvelous milkshakes in Westward Canyon
‚Ä¢ BLUEBERRY: Sensational snow cones in Snowcone Mountain
‚Ä¢ CHERRY: Phenomenal fruit smoothies in Superstar Carnival
‚Ä¢ RASPBERRY: Yummy frozen yogurt in Jungleberry Volcanos

PRIVACY & ADVERTISING
Budge Studios takes children's privacy seriously and ensures that its apps are compliant with privacy laws. This application has received the ‚ÄúESRB (Entertainment Software Rating Board) Privacy Certified Kids‚Äô Privacy Seal‚Äù. Budge Studios was founded in 2010 with the mission to entertain and educate children around the world, through innovation, creativity and fun. comments: This app was my favorite one at a time it was relaxing and makes me happy but now it is a very bad app . Coz till fifth level we sell ice creams in a motorcycle like thing but when we finish the fifth level it says that the road is rocky so we should pay an amount and get a big van to sell the ice cream. And if we look other characters shop and sell ice creams like blueberry muffins shop . They are closed we should complete all levels of the strawberry shortcake's shop and then get them .

My kids like the strawberry shortcake games and I am even happy to pay for the DLC which I did for this. Unfortunately its locked to my account so even though the kids share a tablet as they have their own accounts. I dont want to pay for everything twice so I'm not buying any more DLC.
It is fun...but you only get 4 levels for free which is pretty dissapointing. There are not many things for free.

The game is a 5 star but I gave it 3 Stars because you have to pay for the game and I cant complete it now sorry if you fix the game then I will give it 5 stars but until then it stays as a 3 star game sorry (just my opinion by the way)

It was a complete 5 star experience, simple and easy to learn building up sequences to fulfill the orders. The issue is without paying the game can not be completed, which is still ok as the effort of development deserves the money, but today we realized the already completed demo regions can not be played for free anymore... This was an awful experience, the price is fair but this action made it considerable to pay..

comments: Part1. Game play is too fake. The whole idea is to generate money by making the pre-fold best hand lose so the players keeps buying chips to continue playing. No doubt about it. Nobody should download this game. You will lost all your chips on the river card. Just make sure play with only free money. Don't buy chips. Worst ever game!!!!!! I noticed that they will only reply on good reviews and only technical feedback. Never have they commented how is suck. How much money does this game make?

The game itself is good. However for those who play frequently the winning chance are almost 0.01%. Although they said the 'algorithm' is fair. It is not true. If you have a winning streak for example there would be a time where you will be losing your money, thus it will pushes the player to buy chips using your own money. Its a not good game. For a player like me don't like to spent too much money on game that doesn't rewards us of anything.

Like all the others, it sucks you in fast and then you have to pay to compete. They give you a lot of free chips for a couple days and then you need to buy chips to complete because the adds don't even cover one buy in and the bonuses slow down to almost non existent. No long term, top, player in this game exist without consistent in game purchases. Why can't we just play a poker game without pretending to be billionaires? Just play poker and watch an ad here and there if needed. Greed

Put simply with the new greedy higher Zynga take / rake portion for sit and go's and cash games even if you're a winning player you lose your chips -> pointless. This along with the even worse than before fake predetermined scenarios sent out instead of actual real card distribution is the last straw. How often is it straight over 2 pair, flush over straight, full house over flush. Too many times to be possible in real cards! Fake! NOT random cards. Devs say that these predetermined scenarios are randomly handed out to players to get their crappy certification but it's not random cards and the fake set-ups just get more obvious and annoying the more you play and this aspect like other recent changes seems to have been also tweaked for the worse. I'm out. Used to be an ok experience but not anymore. Closed my account. I imagine that they are losing users in general. I don't miss it.

Rubbish, a con, you play hands where you have the winning hand to be beaten on last card by a hand statistically your unlikely to get, I played over 200 hands with no winning hand. Its a game full of bots to then make you purchase chips, when you spend money on this game you lose more chips, it's a joke. Also when you make purchases you see there is say 5millionin the pot, you win it and only get credited 4.2million its not right at all. You only notice it on larger tables. This game is rigged t

title: Top Eleven 2020 -  Be a soccer manager
description:
Play the award-winning hit soccer manager game Top Eleven 2020 and enjoy the brand new features designed to take the realism and excitement of building your own‚öΩÔ∏è legacy to the next level!
  
With over 200 million registered players, this legendary mobile soccer manager game is one of the most popular mobile simulation games of all time! 
  
 ¬∑ ‚ÄúAs an attempt to bring soccer management into the world of casual, social gaming, this is the best effort yet.‚Äù - The Guardian
 ¬∑ ‚ÄúAmong the soccer management games available on mobile, Top Eleven is without a doubt the most complete.‚Äù - L‚ÄôEquipe
  
Be the best
  
Your place in soccer history awaits! Put your stamp on every part of your club from Day 1. From building your stadium üèüÔ∏è to picking the team on match day, in Top Eleven 2020, what you say goes! Become a hero to your fans and create a soccer club that will deliver the dream of trophies and wins every season! 
 
Run custom training sessions, develop tactics, select and design soccer kits and more! 
  
Manage Your Dream Team of champions
  
Discover, sign and coach the best players who will bring your club success! üìà Whether it be the next League Top Scorer or the goalkeeper who will keep your net safe for years, it‚Äôs up to you to find world-class players and create the ultimate formations and tactics that other Football Managers will fear! 
  
Motivate your stars through League, Cup, Champions League and Super League competitions and become a champion! üèÜüèÜüèÜ

The best Managers in the world are waiting to challenge you. Top Eleven 2020 is played in every nation on earth, and there is always a coach looking for a game, including The Special One - Jos√© Mourinho! ü§® Set up your squad to be the best, outwit and outsmart your opponents on a daily basis and earn global bragging rights. 
  
Team Up With Friends or Play Head to Head
  
Join forces with your friends and get ready for weekend clashes in clan tournaments! Chat with your guild to prepare your soccer strategies before hitting the pitch and battling it out against other clans to earn brilliant rewards. üèÜ

Bring your best squad into Top Eleven‚Äôs Live Events and Challenges! New limited-time competitions hit the pitch all the time, including PVE events against some of the biggest soccer clubs in the world! Take your best fantasy 11, compete against Real Madrid, Liverpool, PSG and many more. Show them who is the hero on the pitch.

Score Amazing Rewards üéÅ

descriptionHTML:
Play the award-winning hit soccer manager game Top Eleven 2020 and enjoy the brand new features designed to take the realism and excitement of building your own‚öΩÔ∏è legacy to the next level!

With over 200 million registered players, this legendary mobile soccer manager game is one of the most popular mobile simulation games of all time!

¬∑ ‚ÄúAs an attempt to bring soccer management into the world of casual, social gaming, this is the best effort yet.‚Äù - The Guardian
¬∑ ‚ÄúAmong the soccer management games available on mobile, Top Eleven is without a doubt the most complete.‚Äù - L‚ÄôEquipe

Be the best

Your place in soccer history awaits! Put your stamp on every part of your club from Day 1. From building your stadium üèüÔ∏è to picking the team on match day, in Top Eleven 2020, what you say goes! Become a hero to your fans and create a soccer club that will deliver the dream of trophies and wins every season!

Run custom training sessions, develop tactics, select and design soccer kits and more!

Manage Your Dream Team of champions

Discover, sign and coach the best players who will bring your club success! üìà Whether it be the next League Top Scorer or the goalkeeper who will keep your net safe for years, it‚Äôs up to you to find world-class players and create the ultimate formations and tactics that other Football Managers will fear!

Motivate your stars through League, Cup, Champions League and Super League competitions and become a champion! üèÜüèÜüèÜ

Ultimate Online Challenge

The best Managers in the world are waiting to challenge you. Top Eleven 2020 is played in every nation on earth, and there is always a coach looking for a game, including The Special One - Jos√© Mourinho! ü§® Set up your squad to be the best, outwit and outsmart your opponents on a daily basis and earn global bragging rights.

Team Up With Friends or Play Head to Head

Join forces with your friends and get ready for weekend clashes in clan tournaments! Chat with your guild to prepare your soccer strategies before hitting the pitch and battling it out against other clans to earn brilliant rewards. üèÜ

Think you have what it takes to assemble the clan that can climb into the Top 100 Worldwide? Prove it!

Master New Ways to Play Football

Bring your best squad into Top Eleven‚Äôs Live Events and Challenges! New limited-time competitions hit the pitch all the time, including PVE events against some of the biggest soccer clubs in the world! Take your best fantasy 11, compete against Real Madrid, Liverpool, PSG and many more. Show them who is the hero on the pitch.

Collect exclusive items and unlock incredible players to join your team during these fun games! Look out for info in-game on when they‚Äôre starting!

Score Amazing Rewards üéÅ

From Special Sponsor Events to daily gifts, there are always awesome rewards to grab! Pick them up as you lead your team on the road to soccer trophies! There‚Äôs always room in a good soccer manager‚Äôs trophy cabinet! Bring home fantastic prizes and rewards for your fans by showing your best on the touchline. They‚Äôre calling for a Triple Crown (League, Cup and Champions League trophies) - think you can bring it to them? Play the best game for soccer lovers on mobile NOW!

comments: Started off great, but then after few seasons the results don't make sense, does not matter how high your standard is, how highly trained you are you will lose to lesser teams after dominating play, The games have the same pattern, you will have lots of play, but you know from the start you will lose come what may..... it seems the lower you train the more successful you are?. The basic game play is good, but it is frustratingly fixed at times..

Would be much better if it wasn't so random at times. Some variance is needed but sometimes you'll lose a game because it predetermines you too. Perfect morale and energy, +21% fans, team rating 30 above opponents, 77% possession, 19 shots to 7, but lose 1-0 despite you attending and making the every adjustment to try to score. Stuff like that happens.

Much improvement since I last played over a year ago. Been playing on and off for five years. Great that you can still win without pay to win. Been able to win a lot and won a lot of trophy's. I've never payed a penny just watched the adds for the bonuses. I like the extra chances to win top players to keep or loan. At last the youth team is useful and get good players. Only small problem lower rated players are hard to transfer away than the past.

Generally a good game but the algorithm is off when calculating results of games and yes, I've heard the arguments of good teams or good players can have off days or off seasons but sometimes it's ridiculous. You work hard, you train hard, you attend matches and you keep your team fully fit. You don't loose every major tournament to smaller teams and managers that never attend. Just doesn't happen, except here! Don't tell me to switch strategies, read forums etc. Fix the algorithm!

I like this game,because you don't have to spend all day playing it,you just do your stuff for 20-30min in a day and done. I think is the best football manager game from now. Is hard until you build a good team but after with 2-3 good transfer/year you can keep a good team all the time.

title: Robbery Bob
description:
Introducing the Man of Steal‚Ä¶ 
Play as Bob, the hapless burglar intent on changing his ways. Unfortunately for Bob, however, he's going to be forced into a few final jobs before he's allowed out of the criminal life. 

‚Ä¢ SUPER SNEAKY 
Sneak past security guards, residents and sleeping bulldogs as you recover the loot in each stage. Use your ninja-like skills to hide in some tight squeezes and avoid detection. 

‚Ä¢ THERE GOES THE NEIGHBORHOOD 
Your sticky-fingered missions will take you through a local neighbourhood, Downtown, and even through some secret labs. Can you get a perfect on every one? 

‚Ä¢ LOOT YOUR HEART OUT 
Bob is going to have to pinch everything from secret documents, to old pairs of clothes, to those always hard-to-find TV remotes! 

‚Ä¢ CRIME IS A FUNNY OLD GAME 
Get engrossed in the comical storyline featuring hilarious animations, a fun script and a genuinely twisting narrative.

title: Barbie‚Ñ¢ Fashion Closet
description:
Welcome to Barbie‚Ñ¢ Fashion Closet - the perfect game to express yourself with fashion! Style Barbie and her friends from head to toe and help them make their dreams come true. 

Choose a character and create fashionable looks! Apply makeup to Barbie and her friends while using fun face stencils to draw and color pretty designs. Be creative with hairdos by selecting from different styles and colors! Choose from hundreds of tops, bottoms, dresses and shoes to create the ultimate look and even create career outfits so the characters look great at their dream jobs! Once you‚Äôve found the perfect outfit, play with a variety of backgrounds for a photo, then add accessories and stickers to add to the scene!  Get even more creative and add a fashion-inspired photo filter!  Now you‚Äôre ready for a photo!  You can save all your looks in your photo album and show your friends! 

With your help, Barbie and her friends will be the most stylish crew around. We can‚Äôt wait to see what you dream up and create!

CHARACTERS.  Meet Nikki, Rene, Teresa, Barbie, and more of her friends to style and help make their dreams come true while exploring new places. 

HAIR & MAKEUP. Choose between a bun, ponytail, braid, and many more hairdos to fit your style. Color your model‚Äôs hair and set the mood. Apply magical makeup with color to pull your look together!

OUTFIT. Select between trendy tops and bottoms or chic dresses with hundreds of outfit combinations to choose from.

PHOTOSHOOT. Take pictures of your designs, save them in your photo album, share them with friends. 

GAME FEATURES. Win collectible fashion items and unlock fun surprises, new careers with purchase packs, and make your dreams come true.

Tell your friends and have fun with the endless fun of Barbie‚Ñ¢ Fashion Closet!

comments: The money you can spend in this game is insane. Great base game but not backed up by fixing glitches or snags on the levels. I've contacted support previously and explained some snags in the game but it's still a real issue. Really disappointing. Using a different phone now, oneplus6. Installed and uninstalled multiple times and it won't even run after spending well over ¬£100 on in-game purchases.

It's a very good game, with realistic ragdoll effect and sound effects. Its great for killing time. I have a slight problem though. Sometimes when my character falls of his bike, his body can occasionally glitch out or get stuck through obstacles. Please can you fix these issues. Thank you for keeping the explosives, very nostalgic touch as I remember playing Trial Xtreme 3 and it was awesome!

It's a free-mium game, but it's never so challenging that you're forced to spend money. No ads unless you choose to watch one which is really nice, and the app isn't pushy at all (doesn't make you feel pressure to spend actual currency). Overall I'll give it 4 stars.

Do yourself a favour and don't download it very inconsistent with its maps, one time the planks will break going full speed then other times you drive into them and It doesn't brake. To up grade you bikes takes along time. Very poorly matched with othere players to race against them when they have the top tier bike and you only have the start up bike so you can't get money to upgrade

I love this game but the only thing that I hate about it is that it's really really hard to get free coins because you guys have kids playing this game and a lot of kids don't have money or a bank card or a card in general so the only thing that I asked for you guys is to make it more easier to get but other than that the game is pretty funny.

title: My Teacher - Classroom Play
description:
Rise and shine! It‚Äôs time to go to school, in one of the funnest school games around! You‚Äôll just LOVE being a teacher! Get ready to teach at the coolest school ever, packed with super fun and creative activities! Be the kids‚Äô favorite new teacher! Help them solve puzzles & take care of adorable pets! School games can be SO awesome.

It‚Äôs time for the most amazing school games adventure! School games have never been this cool and exciting! Once you see what this fabulous school has in store for you, you‚Äôll never want to leave! From pet care to puzzle play, there are endless fun and educational activities! Who knew school games could be SO much fun?!

üå∏Cymera Camera reached 330 million downloads in 2018.
üå∏Beautify your photos with amazing filters, snap sticker, collage maker, pro photo editor studio, crop, instafit, layout, blur, mirror and makeup!

üåàChristmas Selfie Effect.
üåàNew Year Selfie Effect.
üåàNew Selfie Sticker & Beauty Lomo Filter.
üåàSelfie filter to remove acnes & blemishes.
üåàOld Camera & Emoji Text.

Cymera Collage Editor lets you create collage photos, snappy style stickers, posters, backgrounds, text with layout and frames.

‚≠êÔ∏èPopular & New‚≠êÔ∏è

- Real-time Selfie Filters
- Selfie Stickers
- Selfie filter & beauty makeup tools
- Collage Maker & Posters.
- Layout.
- Add Beautiful Smile.
- Smaller & V-shaped face.
- Body and Face Editor.
- Vintage, Natural, Lomo, Film, Sketch and Selfie Filter.
- Skin Care Feature
- Text and MEME.
- Hairstyle & Color.
- Adjust brightness, contrast, color temperature and saturation.
- Import Directly From Google Photos.

„ÄêMain Features„Äë

üå∏Beauty Camera
Professional beauty tools for your skin makeup, slim or face reshape, remove wrinkles, erase face pimples and dark circles.
Hundreds of amazing beauty filters and makeup effects.

üå∏Sweet Camera
Real-time beauty camera selfie effects & makeup camera

üéÄAmazing Filters
Perfect instant selfies with 150 filters.
Free filter packages for selfie, nation flags, air shape, vintage-feel, pastel colors, film-effect, black & white.
Lens flare effects or light laked effects.
Create your own collection of favorite filters.

üòòCamera Lenses and Silent Mode
7 different and fascinating camera lenses. üì∑
(Divided lenses/FishEye/Lomo and more)
Anti-shake, timer, touch shooting, out-focusing options.
Silent mode to shoot wherever you want without disturbing others.
Bluetooth connection is available for selfie sticks with remote.

üíéSimple and Easy for Collage
Choose photos from your gallery and instantly see them laid out in a cool collage. You can rotate, resize photos with simple touch gestures. Easy to change spacing, margin, corners of photos and border colors, background, patterns of la youts.
Different types of grid to combine photos (up to 9 photos) into one.
Change the size of the photo grid. 100% match on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, etc.

üéâRetouch or Adjust Photos Instantly
Automatic face recognition including enlarge eyes, smile and slim feature.
Edit with Liquify, skin corrections (brightening, whitening, concealers)
200 kinds of natural hair and face makeup items.
No Crop feature.

üíÑBody Retouch Photo Editor
‚ú¶ Instantly taller, lengthen your legs, reshape your body.
Stunning feature to Slim your waist.
The best photo editor to lift your hip.
No more bow legs. Get a sexy, shaped legs in few seconds!

‚ú®Super Easy and Fast Editing Tools
Brightness/contrast/mosaic/crop/rotate and more.
Extraordinary effects including lights/borders/vignette.
High quality resolution for clean and clear photos.
Advanced red eye removal function.
Color splash feature.

üé®Upgrade with Unique Items
Trendy AR stickers including animal face, air shape, love stickers, beauty filters, light effects, frame.
Brush items for hand writings and drawings.
Variety of fonts in text feature.
Face pop and meme.

üëìSharing Photos & Smart Gallery
Organize photos by date, location, selfies, etc.
Now you can set your edited photos as wallpaper.
Send or share your photos on your social media channel or other instant chat.

Korean, English, Spanish, German, Japanese, Chinese (traditional and simplified), Thai, Portuguese, Russian, Indonesian, Turkish, and Vietnamese.

comments: App is usually great but after update yesterday, it's not working! Anyone else not able to open their main menu? Without that feature I'LL be digging through my pictures for years through the view all area to find anything....Please fix whatever you messed with so it works again, please. Thanks
Features are easy to use. Photo enhancement for dummies. I use this app to create thumbnails for my YouTube channel (That Girl China - Dollar Tree Hauls) and to make all the pics I take look amazing.

I've been using this app for years, and I've downloaded several other photo editing apps in that time, but always return to cymera. It's easy to use, intuitive, and the menus stay consistently the same, making it fast to find the tools I need. I do wish that they would add some more features and some variety. I often have to use Line Camera in conjunction with Cymera to get the extra options I need for text, stickers, and line drawing options. For a basic easy photo editor though, this is good.

I think it has more color variations than my mobile phone. After clicking a photo, my Android started to misbehave and says" unfortunately android.process.media has stopped". When i deleted the photo, everything becomes good. It's a very good app with nice features. But what can i do about it now.
This app is really fantastic I have ever used as compared to any other camera app. This app even doesn't need any editing if clicked by it.

title: Rope Hero: Vice Town
description:
Meet the biggest update of the free game about the funny blue super hero. We made huge improvements and additions. The updated world has become even more interesting and exciting. We have improved the quality of graphics, completely redesigned the huge open world and increased its size.

Now it's time to become a real super hero. It's time to be strong, fast, and fearless. Start your mission right now and rise to the top of fame. Try your hand at an exciting 3D third-person shooter with RPG elements, get a new gaming experience and new emotions playing the new version.

Use your power to free the city from crime. The main character still has to fight evil by playing interesting quests. The hero will fight with gangsters and other evil that filled this city. The hero will win fame and gain huge popularity in the city. Also, the hero is waiting for exciting chases and fights with various bosses.

Your character still has super powers. He has an unlimited super rope in his Arsenal, as well as the ability to make mega jumps and landings, the ability to move around buildings, and many more interesting things. With the help of a rope, the hero can quickly move through the buildings of the city, move over the buildings and be aware of what is happening on the city streets.

We have significantly expanded the game store, as well as discounts on products. The game has updated the range of ammunition for the player, you can customize your character using any sets. This makes it unique among others.

The game has updated the set of vehicles, appeared beach SUV, bike, improved pink tank, helicopter, plane. The game has a large number of improved vehicles for movement, everyone can choose their own transport to taste.

Your super hero in the game has a huge Arsenal of cool pieces. Try the most popular of them, you can get them in the game store.

Skateboard-this thing is always available to the player, with it you can more interesting to move around the city, perform interesting tricks and maneuvers.

An improved version of the parachute, it has more controllability, with the help of the updated parachute, the hero will be able to perform more extreme tricks.

GLIDER-an addition to the super hero costume that allows him to fly on jet propulsion, like a fast military aircraft. This thing helps to move very quickly on the map, to get away from prosecution. The jet wings are equipped with a weapon system that extends the functionality and allows you to return fire.

Selfie stick-allows you to take photos of interesting moments in the game and share them with your friends. This funny thing can also be a great means of self-defense. Since a real super hero is always on the alert.

The game has expanded the Arsenal of weapons, new SCI-FI blasters and classic powerful guns.

Especially helps the hero in quests new super hero weapons.

Freezer-a gun that allows you to freeze opponents for a while. This gun allows you to freeze tanks, robots, cars.

GRAVIGUN-cool weapon that allows you to attract enemies to yourself. This is a great thing, the possibilities of its use are limited only by the imagination of the player.

FLAMETHROWER - a powerful gun that shoots fire, with it you can set fire to everything in the city that you want.

DANCE GUN - a fun thing, with the help of it, the player can make all their opponents dance. With this thing, you can have great fun in the 3D city.

We hope you will like the new version of the game very much.

comments: Great game! It's definitely a puzzle game. It takes several tries to figure out how to beat each level. That's what I love about it! I paid the 2.99 to turn off the ads. Finally completed the last level. Took forever! Please add more levels! UPDATE: It's been a couple of months now since I finished the last level. Mind you, I don't know when the last level was actually completed by boom bit, but I keep getting updates for all of their games, but no new levels. Give us some new levels, man!

The game is good, but very repetitive - just like the ads. You basically have to keep doing the same level over and over to earn enough coin to upgrade your car enough to pass that level. I paid to remove the ads as they were REALLY annoying. Even when you pay to remove the ads, you still get ads trying to get you to pay more money to unlock vehicles. I completed this game with the 2 cars that come by default within a few hours. Just waiting for new levels to be added. Not sure they will though.

While my son I enjoyed playing the game, the ads can be a little bit ridiculous but I do understand it's a free game but still. I'm glad I didn't pay $299 for the no ads because there's not enough levels, with that said level 11 the vertical jump with the mountain yeah that can go to hell. I like a hard game but if I'm ready to throw the phone that's when I quit playing a game. only reason I will keep it is because my son likes playing it and he wants to unlock the rest of the free cars.

Phenomenal Game but its very clear its unfinished. Level 11 is definitely meant to be a cash grab. Its 10 orders of magnitude more difficult than all the levels before it. Then level 12 is the final level. You can beat it over and over but the "next level" is always just the same level 12. Also, the ads are horrific!

Heavy on ads, and level 11 designed to being in the revenue by being nearly impossible so you just watch a ton of ads or cough up the $$, but that doesn't solve how hard the level is. It also has some kind of memory leak that requires a hard close every so often. Otherwise it can generally be fun to play.

title: Wrestling Revolution 3D
description:
The heavyweight champion of mobile wrestling - celebrating over 60 MILLION downloads!

The "Wrestling Revolution" rumbles into the 3rd dimension, where it now features BOTH aspects of the business in ONE epic universe. A wrestling career challenges you to take shots in the ring, whereas a "booking" career allows you to call the shots backstage - promoting entertaining matches every week for ratings. Seeing each side of the curtain gives you an even better appreciation for the other, and ensures you'll never grow bored of wrestling again! Both modes are available to play for free, with the option to upgrade to enjoy the "Pro" experience with no ads or limitations.

And if playing Pro isn't enough, a separate "Backstage Pass" allows you to play God by saving your changes to all 9 rosters before pitting your immortals against each other in dream matches of your own creation! With 4 pages of rules to mix & match - including up to 20 wrestlers in rings of any shape or size - the only limit is your imagination. You can also blow off steam with no pressure by revisiting the 8 weeks of supercards from the game's promotional tour. Not to mention the interactive training process that teaches you how to lock up in the first place.

BASIC CONTROLS
The game features an interactive tutorial that you are advised to play through, but the basic controls are as follows:
CURSORS = Movement (double-tap to dash)
A = Attack (with a direction to aim high, without to aim low)
G = Grapple
R = Run
P = Pick-Up / Drop (with a direction to throw)
T = Taunt / Pin / Referee duties
EYE = Change focus / Turn opponent around
HEALTH METER = Switch character
CLOCK = Pause / Change camera angle

* This game is also compatible with Android controllers such as NVidia Shield 2k or MOGA Pro ("B" Mode).

PERFORMANCE
Although every effort has been made to keep performance as high as possible, some devices may benefit from a visit to the Options menu to fine tune the display:
- The number of characters is perhaps the biggest factor so consider turning off referees and setting a limit on the match size.
- If you don't want to sacrifice numbers, you can sacrifice polygons instead and opt for "Basic" character models (no fingers).
- The ropes are surprisingly demanding and you may squeeze in an extra character if you make them "Static".
- Turning off shadows and reducing crowd sprites may also help.

I regret that there's more to this game than I could ever fit in an app store description, so please consult the online guides for further reading:
www.MDickie.com/guides/wr3d_booking.htm

* Please note that Wrestling Revolution depicts a fictitious universe. Any similarity to real wrestlers or promotions is purely coincidental.

I first thought that it can be due to my device's ram, which is 2GB but later I found out a friends device which has this same game and ram as 6GB, while he is also facing the same issue. Please fix this.....

I like the game, it has good graphics.but the things u should work on is the controls, because it is weak,when hitting your opponent the wrestler already smack u down.and another thing is there should be a commentator, during the fight.it's a good game in gameplay, but need to be upgraded.and the wrestler's are not real, no real names,no undertaker,or Justina..so poor.‚òπÔ∏è‚òπÔ∏è

This game is rigged, everything is working against you. I'm giving it a second star because I'm actually enjoying the game. The stats of the characters are actually useless, because someone you're more than by far can just do as he pleases with you and your moves. It would have been a very wonderful game if you didn't make it very unfair to the players. How can a ref count slowly for you and count fast for your opponent in a game? It's a rigged game, not challenging at all, just rigged.

The best wrestling game on the market, and as a fellow game developer extremely well done for what it is, the actual controls have a bit of a learning curve but its amazing once you get them down. I had to buy the full game. Super excited for the new one boss. :) if you need a tester i would be honored.

It was a nice and wonderful game, good graphics, almost real characters and credible moves but I rate this 4 stars because I think it wasn't totally perfect. May I suggest that you can set those attack here as a finisher or mid-air counter like superkick or bicycle kick. I think there's also a mistake in this game. How a gaunt wrestlers lift up a chubby and 7 ft tall opponent? Then if your opponent kick up to your pin, you can't get up emmidiately instead your opponent get up first than you.
